While the Portland protests have centered in downtown, the demonstrations on Saturday roamed areas east of the downtown core, where the city's federal courthouse is.	波特兰的抗议活动集中在市中心，而周六的示威游行则覆盖联邦法院所在的市中心以东的地区。
Kansas City mayor welcomes federal help in solving murders, but worries about Trump's motives	堪萨斯市长欢迎联邦协助破案 但对 Trump 动机表示担心
Kansas City Mayor Quinton Lucas questioned on Sunday President Trump's motives for sending federal agents into U.S. cities - saying that while he would welcome the help in solving a slew of murders in the Midwestern city, he thinks the move could be more about buoying Trump's reelection chances.	周日，堪萨斯城市长 Quinton Lucas 质疑了总统 Trump 向美国各城市派遣联邦执法人员的动机，表示虽然他欢迎联邦协助调查发生在该中西部城市的多起谋杀案，但他认为此举的主要目的还是为了增加 Trump 的连任机会。
"I was pretty frustrated this week [that] the president mentioned the George Floyd protests, mentioned the Black Lives Matter movement," Lucas, a Democrat, said on "Fox News Sunday" of the recent protests over racial inequality and police brutality.	民主党人 Lucas 在《福克斯周日新闻》节目上谈到最近因种族不平等和警察暴力而引发的抗议活动，表示：“本周，总统提及有关 George Floyd 之死的抗议活动，以及‘黑人的命也是命’的人权运动，我对此感到非常失望。”
"That is not the case in Kansas City. We've had year-over-year increases [but] what we need help on is actually clearing some of the unsolved murders."	“堪萨斯城的情况不一样。和去年相比，我们的案子增多了，（但）我们真正需要的是联邦政府能够帮助我们解决一些悬案。”
Lucas added: "Let's try to have a pinpointed and targeted focus on solving murders...I think if you listen to recent statements... we are happy to work with federal agents in a limited scope."	Lucas 补充道：“让我们尽量把重点放在解决谋杀案上……我觉得，如果你听了最近的发言……就知道我们很乐意在一定范围内与联邦执法人员合作。”
Despite his willingness to have federal agents work with local law enforcement, Lucas said that Trump's rhetoric - specifically in light of the controversy surrounding the tactics employed in Portland, Ore., by the federal agents - has caused many of his constituents to voice concern about the presence of agents on the city streets.	Lucas 表示，他愿意让联邦执法人员与当地执法部门合作。但是，联邦执法人员在俄勒冈州波特兰市采取的措施引发争议，而 Trump 的言论导致很多本区选民对于联邦执法人员出现在大街小巷一事感到担忧。
"What we don't need is more fuel on the fire from federal agents to make, I think, an exciting political issue," he said.	他说道：“我们不希望联邦执法人员对本就群情激愤的政治事件火上浇油。”
Trump on Wednesday announced that he was deploying 100 federal agents to Chicago to help combat rising rates of some crimes - a move that marks an expansion of the White House's intervention into local law enforcement as Trump continues to position himself as the "law and order" president.	周三，特朗普宣布向芝加哥市派遣 100 名联邦执法人员，帮助当地应对部分犯罪行为增多的问题，Trump 称自己为代表“法律与秩序”的总统，而派遣联邦执法人员的举动也标志着白宫加大对地方执法的干预力度。
The "surge" of agents announced on Wednesday to Chicago and other American cities is part of Operation Legend - named after 4-year-old LeGend Taliferro, who was fatally shot while sleeping in a Kansas City apartment late last month.	Trump 周三宣布向芝加哥等城市派遣大批联邦执法人员的举动是“莱金德行动” (Operation Legend) 的一部分，该行动是以 4 岁男孩 LeGend Taliferro 的名字命名，上月底，他在位于堪萨斯城的家中睡觉时遭到枪击，不幸死亡。
While sending federal agents to aid local law enforcement is not unprecedented - Attorney General Bill Barr announced a similar surge effort in December for seven cities that had seen spiking violence - the type of federal agent being sent, and some of their tactics, have raised concerns among state and local lawmakers.	此前也发生过派遣联邦执法人员协助地方执法部门的情况，去年 12 月，美国司法部长 Bill Barr 也曾因暴力犯罪激增而向七个城市派遣大量联邦执法人员，然而，此举还是引发了各州选民和当地立法者对派遣人员类型及其采取措施的担忧。
A number of lawmakers from New York to Portland have spoken out against the Trump administration sending the agents to their cities, especially following reports that unidentified federal agents detained protesters in Portland and took them away in unmarked vehicles.	纽约、波特兰等立法者都公开反对 Trump 政府向他们的城市派遣联邦执法人员，特别是有报道称，身份不明的联邦执法人员在波特兰拘留了抗议者，用没有警方标志的车辆将他们带走。
Portland has been hit with near-daily demonstrations against police brutality and systemic racism since the death of George Floyd while in Minneapolis police custody on May 25.	5 月 25 日，George Floyd 被明尼阿波利斯市警方拘留后死亡，从那以后，波特兰几乎每天都有反对警察暴力执法和系统性种族主义的示威活动。
Local authorities also have complained that the surges have only exacerbated tensions, and criminal justice experts say the efforts defy explanation because of the unprecedented moment America is living through - with a pandemic, historic unemployment and a mass reckoning over racism and how people of color are treated by police.	当地政府也抱怨称，联邦执法人员的激增只会加剧紧张态势，刑事司法专家表示，此举令人无法理解，因为美国正处于不寻常的时期：疫情、失业率创历史新高、大规模对种族主义的反思，以及对警察针对有色人种态度的反思。
£10m fund set up to support Scottish events	苏格兰政府设立 1,000 万英镑资金资助赛事活动
Organisers of cultural, community and sporting events are to be offered financial support while they remain affected by lockdown restrictions.	疫情封锁期间受影响的文化、社区、体育活动组织者将获得财政资助。
The Scottish government's £10m funding package also aims to help event suppliers.	苏格兰政府的 1,000 万英镑资助计划同样旨在帮助各活动供应商。
The government said it was looking at how events could restart safely in the future.	苏格兰政府表示，目前他们正着眼于寻找未来安全恢复各项活动的方法。
Economy Secretary Fiona Hyslop said the coronavirus pandemic had had a "devastating impact" on the sector.	财政大臣 Fiona Hyslop 认为，新冠疫情对各项活动造成“灾难性的影响”。
Scotland's festival scene and sporting events such as the Highland games have been among those affected by restrictions brought in to prevent the spread of Covid-19.	为防止新冠病毒传播而采取的限制措施，使得苏格兰的节日活动和高地运动会等体育赛事均受到影响。
Ms Hyslop said: "Whilst we've had the positive step that drive-in events can resume, most of the sector will be unable to operate for some time to come.	Hyslop 女士表示：“虽然我们迈出了积极的一步，比如汽车影院得以恢复，但多数行业一段时间内还无法运营。
"We've worked closely and constructively with the sector on the challenges they face and they have brought forward some creative ideas on how they can begin to operate safely.	我们与行业内组织者展开了密切且富有建设性的合作，针对各自面临的挑战，他们提出了一些如何安全运营的创造性方案。
"In addition to providing immediate support, some of this funding will look to bolster innovation and aid the longer-term recovery of the events industry."	除了直接提供资助外，资金的一部分还将用于促进创新和维持赛事活动的长期恢复。”
The Event Industry Advisory Group said the sector had been one of the first to go into lockdown and would be among the last to fully emerge from it.	Event Industry Advisory Group 认为，该行业是最早受封锁限制的领域，也将是最晚得以全面解除限制的领域之一。
Chairman Peter Duthie, who is also chief executive of the SEC in Glasgow, said events contributed about £6bn each year to Scotland's economy.	该集团董事长 Peter Duthie 同时也兼任格拉格斯证券交易委员会执行长官的一职，他表示，赛事活动每年为苏格兰带来近 60 亿英镑的收益。
He said: "Additional funding from government for this important sector is very welcome and much needed, both by the event organisers and the wider supply chain businesses who are being hit exceptionally hard by the ongoing effect of an extended period of lockdown."	他说：“政府额外为该行业拨款十分必要，并且得到赛事活动组织者及众多相关供应链企业的广泛支持，他们在长期的封锁限制中均遭受了严重的经济损失。”
Shivraj Singh Chouhan On Testing Covid Positive	Shivraj Singh Chouhan 确诊感染新冠肺炎
Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan, who on Saturday confirmed he had tested positive for COVID-19, tweeted Sunday morning to say that he is "fine" and to offer his praise for front-line workers in the war on coronavirus.	中央邦首席部长 Shivraj Singh Chouhan 周六证实，他的新冠病毒检测结果呈阳性，他在周日上午发布的推文中称自己“没事”，并赞扬了奋战在抗疫第一线的工作人员。
The Chief Minister also repeated his warnings from yesterday, when he urged people to follow guidelines, such as social distancing and the use of face masks.	首席部长还重复了他在昨天发出的警告，呼吁大家遵守防疫指导方针，例如保持社交距离和戴口罩。
"I am fine, my friends. The dedication of coronavirus warriors, who selflessly risk their lives, is praiseworthy. I salute all coronavirus warriors of the state," Mr Chouhan tweeted from Bhopal's Chirayu Hospital, where he was admitted yesterday.	“朋友们，我没事。抗疫战士们冒着生命危险，无私奉献，他们都值得赞扬。我向全国所有抗疫战士们致敬，” Chouhan 在博帕尔的 Chirayu 医院发推文如是说，他于昨天被收治入院。
"Keep two metres distance, wash your hands frequently and wear face masks - these are the biggest weapons we have to avoid the coronavirus. I appeal to all people - use these weapons for yourself and your loved ones," he said.	“保持两米的距离，勤洗手，戴口罩——这就是我们抗击冠状病毒最有效的武器，”他说，“我希望所有人都能够利用这些武器保护自己和家人。”
"All of you be careful, stay safe and healthy. This is what I pray to God," Mr Chouhan added.	Chouhan 最后补充说：“大家都小心一点，希望你们都平安健康。这也是我向神祈祷的内容。”
On Saturday Mr Chouhan had tweeted that he had tested positive for the virus despite his best efforts to avoid infection and warned that "just a little carelessness invites the coronavirus."	周六，Chouhan 在推特上说，他的病毒检测结果呈阳性，尽管他已经尽了最大的努力避免这种情况的发生，他警告称，“一点点的疏忽大意都可能会感染上冠状病毒”。
Tweeting this morning Mr Chouhan said that despite the threat of infection there was "no need to fear" and urged those showing symptoms to get themselves tested.	今天早上，Chouhan 在推特上说，虽然感染病毒的威胁还在，但大家“没有必要害怕”，并呼吁有症状的人去检测一下。
"If you are infected, there is no need to fear. Do not hide symptoms but tell doctors immediately, so treatment can be started. Timely treatment will make you healthy," he said.	他说：“如果你感染了病毒，也不用害怕。不要隐瞒你的症状，立刻告诉医生，然后开始接受治疗。及时治疗就能恢复健康。”
Madhya Pradesh has nearly 27,000 COVID-19 cases, of which more than 7,600 are active and 799 are deaths linked to the virus.	中央邦已有近 27,000 例确诊病例，其中 7,600 例为活跃病例，并有 799 例与新冠病毒相关的死亡病例。
India has recorded a surge in COVID-19 cases in the past weeks, with over 45,000 new cases detected every day since July 23.	过去几周，印度确诊病例激增，自 7 月 23 日以来每日新增确诊病例高达 45,000 例。
The total number of confirmed coronavirus cases is rapidly approaching 14 lakh; of these more than 4.67 lakh are active cases and over 32,000 are deaths linked to the virus.	新冠肺炎确诊病例总数迅速接近 140 万例，其中超 46.7 万例为活跃病例，超 32,000 例死亡病例与该病毒有关。
The spike in cases, coinciding with the staggered relaxation of lockdown guidelines in non-containment zones of the country, has propelled India to third on the list of most affected nations.	确诊病例激增之际，印度国内非封锁区域不同程度地放松了封锁措施，导致印度的疫情严重程度排在了全球第三。
Only the United States (41.78 lakh cases) and Brazil (23.94 lakh cases) are worse off.	排在印度前面的是美国（417.8 万确诊病例）和巴西（239.4 万确诊病例）。
Kanye West says he can beat Joe Biden "off of write ins" - RT USA News	Kanye West 表示可以凭自选票击败 Joe Biden——RT 电视台美国新闻
Fresh from airing his family's dirty laundry on Twitter, rap enigma Kanye West has once again breathed life into his will-he-won't-he presidential bid, claiming that he could beat Joe Biden on write-in votes alone.	继在 Twitter 上抖搂家庭的各种不堪之后，说唱歌手 Kanye West 再次为他飘忽不定的总统竞选造势，称自己仅凭自选票就能击败 Joe Biden。
Days after announcing a new album and revealing that he's been trying to divorce wife Kim Kardashian for two years, Kanye West again turned his attention to his 2020 presidential campaign on Saturday, in an all-caps announcement declaring "I CAN BEAT BIDEN OFF OF WRITE INS."	Kanye West 于几天前发布了一张新专辑，并透露出自己两年来一直打算与妻子 Kim Kardashian 离婚，周六他将注意力再度转到 2020 年总统竞选活动上，高调宣称“我可以凭自选票击败 Biden”。
If West is still serious about running for the presidency, write-in votes may be his only path to victory, or indeed any kind of showing.	如果 West 仍然将竞选总统一事当真的话，自选票可能是他获胜的唯一途径，否则他只是在作秀而已。
The rapper announced his candidacy on July 4, past the deadline to file as a candidate in at least six states.	7 月 4 日，这位说唱歌手宣布竞选总统，时间晚于在至少六个州报名参选的最后期限。
Nevertheless, West pressed ahead and filed the proper papers with the Federal Election Commission (FEC), and managed to get his name on ballots in Oklahoma.	尽管如此，West 还是向联邦选举委员会（FEC）提交了相应的文件，并成功让自己的名字印在俄克拉荷马州的选票上。
Since then he's held one campaign rally, during which he addressed a crowd clad in a bulletproof vest, delivering his speech without a microphone or podium.	此后，他举行了一场竞选集会，穿着防弹背心向集会群众致辞，没有使用麦克风或讲台。
West came out against abortion, weeping as he delivered a pro-Christian message he said would make the media "tell you that I'm crazy."	West 发声反对堕胎，哭着传递出亲基督教的信息，他说这会让媒体“告诉你我疯了”。
That much was true, and West's rally was described across news sites and gossip mags as a publicity stunt, evidence of mental illness, or both.	这并非妄言，新闻网站和八卦杂志将 West 的集会说成是宣传噱头、精神疾病的证明，或二者兼而有之。
However, a recent poll put West at two percent nationwide, neck and neck with the Libertarian Party's Jo Jorgensen and a point ahead of the Green Party's Howie Hawkins.	然而，新一轮民调显示，West 在全国范围内的支持率为 2%，与自由党候选人 Jo Jorgensen 并驾齐驱，领先于绿党候选人 Howie Hawkins。
While it is extremely unlikely that he could surpass Joe Biden's reputed 48 percent, he could in theory siphon enough votes from Biden to see President Donald Trump clinch a second term - something pundits on both sides suspect may be his plan.	虽然他几乎没有可能超过获得了 48% 支持率的 Joe Biden，但理论上他能够从 Biden 那里吸取足够的票数，让 Donald Trump 成功连任——双方的专家都怀疑这可能就是他的打算。
Rock from Mars heads home after 600,000 years on Earth	在地球停留 60 万年的火星岩石将被送回家园
A small piece of rock will be hurled into space this week on one of the strangest interplanetary voyages ever attempted.	本周，一小块岩石将被抛入太空，这是有史以来最奇怪的星际旅行之一。
A tiny piece of Martian basalt the size of a 10p coin will be launched on board a US robot probe on Thursday and propelled towards the red planet on a seven-month journey to its home world.	一块 10 便士硬币大小的火星玄武岩将于本周搭载美国机器人探测器发射升空，向这颗红色星球推进，并在历时 7 个月的太空之旅后返回火星。
This extraordinary odyssey, the interplanetary equivalent of sending coals to Newcastle, will form a key part of Nasa's forthcoming Mars 2020 expedition.	虽然这次非凡的冒险看起来就像将煤炭送到纽卡斯尔（十六世纪以后为英国主要的煤港）一样毫无意义，但是这将成为即将到来的美国宇航局 (NASA) 火星 2020 探险的一个关键部分。
Space engineers say the rock - which has been donated by the Natural History Museum in London - will be used to calibrate detectors on board the robot rover Perseverance after it lands and begins its search for signs of past life on the planet.	太空工程师表示，这块由伦敦自然历史博物馆捐赠的岩石，将在“毅力号”探测器着陆后，用于校准机器人的探测器，并开始寻找火星上生命存在过的迹象。
Some of the Martian meteorites we have are very fragile, but we chose this one specifically because it's as tough as old boots	我们拥有的一些火星陨石非常脆弱，但我们专门选择了这块，因为它就像旧靴子一样坚硬
"When you turn on instruments and begin to tune them up before using them for research, you calibrate them on materials that are going to be like the unknown substances you are about to study.	“当你打开仪器并在研究前对其进行校准时，你将使用与即将研究的未知事物类似的材料对其进行校准。
So what better for studying rocks on Mars than a lump that originated there?" said Professor Caroline Smith, the Natural History Museum's curator of meteorites.	那么，对于研究火星上的岩石而言，还有什么比一块来自火星的岩石更适合作为研究对象?”自然历史博物馆陨石馆馆长 Caroline Smith 教授说道。
Scientists were confident that the rock they were returning to Mars originated on the planet, added Smith, who is also a member of the Mars 2020 science team.	Smith 同时也是“火星 2020”科学小组的成员，他补充说，科学家们相信他们带回的岩石来自火星。
"Tiny bubbles of gas trapped inside that meteorite have exactly the same composition as the atmosphere of Mars, so we know our rock came from there."	“陨石内的微小气泡与火星大气层的成分完全相同，所以我们确信这颗岩石来自那里。”
It is thought that the Martian meteorite was created when an asteroid or comet plunged into the planet about 600,000 to 700,000 years ago, spraying debris into space.	据信，这块火星陨石是在大约 60 万到 70 万年前，一颗小行星或彗星撞击火星时产生的，并伴有碎片散落在太空中。
One of those pieces of rubble swept across the solar system and eventually crashed on to Earth.	其中一块碎石扫过太阳系，最终落在地球上。
That meteorite - now known as SAU 008 - was discovered in Oman in 1999 and has been in the care of the Natural History Museum since then.	这颗现在被称为 SAU 008 的陨石于 1999 年在阿曼被发现，从那时起一直由自然历史博物馆保管。
Among the instruments fitted to the Perseverance rover is a high-precision laser called Sherloc, which will be used to decipher the chemical composition of rocks and determine if they might contain organic materials that indicate life once existed - or still exists - on Mars.	在“毅力号”探测器上安装的仪器中，有一台名为 Sherloc 的高精度激光发射器，它将用来破译火星岩石的化学成分，并确定它们是否含有可以表明火星上曾经存在或仍然存在生命的有机物质。
The inclusion of a piece of SAU 008 is intended to ensure this is done with maximum accuracy.	添加一块 SAU 008 是为了确保最大精度完成此操作。
"The piece of rock we are sending was specifically chosen because it is the right material in terms of chemistry, but also it is a very tough rock," added Smith.	Smith 补充道：“我们特别挑选了这块岩石，因为它在化学成分上是契合的，而且它是一块非常坚硬的岩石。”
"Some of the Martian meteorites we have are very fragile. This meteorite is as tough as old boots."	“我们发现的一些火星陨石十分易碎。但这块陨石就像旧靴子一样坚硬。”
Once Perseverance has selected the most promising rocks it can find, it will dump them in caches on the Martian surface.	“毅力号”找到有研究价值的岩石后，会将它们储藏在火星表面。
These will then be retrieved by subsequent robot missions and blasted into space towards Earth for analysis.	然后，这些岩石将被后续发送至火星的机器人回收，并从太空发射到地球上进行研究分析。
Man found with gunshot wounds in Mambourin near Werribee	韦里比附近的 Mambourin 发现一名男子中枪
A man has been rushed to hospital after being shot in Melbourne's west overnight.	昨晚，墨尔本西部一名男子中枪后被紧急送往医院救治。
Police were called to Mambourin, near Werribee, about 8pm where they found a man aged in his 20s with suspected gunshot wounds to the lower body in Yard St.	警方接到报警后赶到韦里比附近的 Mambourin，大约晚上 8 点，警方在 Yard 街发现一名 20 岁左右的男子，下半身疑有多处枪伤。
The man was taken to hospital with non-life threatening injuries.	男子被送往医院救治，并无生命危险。
Police said the investigation was ongoing.	警方表示正在对这起案件展开调查。
Sunday with Oliver Spencer: "I won't get dressed up, Sundays are for loungewear'	Oliver Spencer 的周日：“周日我不打扮，就穿家居服”
How does Sunday start?	请问您的周日是如何开始的？
With me stumbling down the stairs and falling over the dog on my way to make my wife a cup of tea.	我跌跌撞撞地走下楼梯，在给妻子泡茶的路上被狗绊倒。
If I'm lucky, we'll have escaped London to our coastal house on the Isle of Wight.	幸运的话，我们也许有时间离开伦敦，去我们在怀特岛的海边别墅度个假。
The two of us will sit together and look across the water in silence.	坐在一起，望着水面发呆。
It sounds serene...	这听起来很惬意......
It is, until 8am when two or three of our boys bang on the door demanding breakfast.	直到早晨 8 点，家的几个男孩儿会跑来敲门，让我们做早餐。
It's bacon and eggs for them, spinach and mushrooms for us; then if the weather's good, we kick the boys out.	通常，他们的早餐是培根和鸡蛋，而我们的是菠菜和蘑菇，天气好的话，就会把孩子们赶到外面去玩。
We'll swim, paddleboard or take a walk around the beautiful Quarr Abbey, which looks like something straight out of Game of Thrones.	我们会去游泳、划船，或者在酷似《权力的游戏》场景的 Quarr 修道院旁散步。
And during lockdown?	那么疫情封城期间呢？
For the first two weeks I was in total denial, I couldn't believe my business was shut down.	最开始两周，我完全不能接受，无法相信我的店已经歇业了。
I distracted myself by obsessing about the life or death of my newly planted garden.	后来，我就照顾新种植的植物转移自己的注意力。
Otherwise, I've been experimenting in the kitchen: intensely flavoured eel and shiitake broth and a double cream brioche have been my standouts.	另外，我还在厨房里做了些菜品“实验”，比如味道浓郁的鳗鱼香菇汤和双倍奶油的蛋卷，后来这些都成为了我的拿手菜。
How do you unwind?	会如何放松自己呢？
I won't get dressed up, Sundays are for loungewear, half-cropped tracksuit bottoms and a white T-shirt.	我不会穿得很正式，周日是穿家居服的日子，半裁剪运动裤和白色 T 恤。
After a lunch of roast chicken, I'll snooze with the papers on a deckchair in the garden.	吃完一顿烤鸡午餐后，我会在花园的躺椅上拿着报纸打盹。
I try not to drink: it helps clear my head before Monday comes calling.	周日晚上我尽量不喝酒，这样有助于在周一保持清醒。
A Sunday that sticks out?	有没有印象深刻的周日？
After a long Saturday night at my sister-in-law's 40th birthday party in New York, around midnight my heavily pregnant wife decided we'd better get going.	在某一个周日，我们在纽约参加了嫂嫂 40 岁的生日宴，并度过了一个漫长的夜晚，差不多午夜时，我怀孕的妻子感觉她快分娩了，于是我们决定离开宴会。
She was determined to enjoy herself, telling people it was her third after all.	她本来打算好好玩一下，告诉大家这毕竟已经是她的第三胎了，应该不会有什么大问题。
We left the party and she went straight into labour.	但是，我们刚离开宴会，她就直接分娩了。
And Sunday night?	周日的晚上怎么度过？
By 7pm we've packed the car and have boarded the ferry to Portsmouth.	晚上 7 点，我们把行李装上车，然后登上前往朴茨茅斯的渡轮。
A drive up the A3 and we're back in London for the week: kids in bed, I walk the dog and have a bowl of cereal.	从轮渡下来以后，我们开车上了 A3 高速公路，回到伦敦准备迎接工作日的到来，到家后，孩子们就去睡觉了，我遛完狗回来又吃了一碗麦片。
I'm good with leaving the Isle of Wight to head back to the city, I know if I don't, I can't have a home there at all.	我很乐意从怀特岛回到伦敦，因为我知道，如果不这样做，我也不可能在怀特岛有个家。

Two police officers in Kenya have been arrested in connection with a shooting in which two people were killed.	肯尼亚两名警察因涉嫌在一起枪击事件中造成两人死亡被拘捕。
The shooting happened at Soko Ng'ombe market in eastern Garissa county on Saturday, during a protest against the arrest of a man suspected of murder.	枪击事件于周六发生在东部加里萨县的 Soko Ng'ombe 市场，当时，市场内正针对一名男子涉嫌谋杀的案件进行抗议。
The two victims have been named as Aden Abdi Madobe and Muhiyadin Adow Shibin.	两名受害者为 Aden Abdi Madobe 和 Muhiyadin Adow Shibin。
Kenya's police watchdog has launched an investigation into the shooting.	肯尼亚警察局监察机关已就枪击事件展开调查。
It will include "forensic analysis" of the officers' guns.	调查程序包括对涉事枪械的取证分析。
Garissa MP Aden Duale called the deaths "heinous" and condemned "police brutality" in a statement posted to Facebook.	加里萨国会议员 Aden Duale 称该事件“令人发指”，并在脸书网发布的帖子中谴责“警方暴力执法”。
Campaigners have raised concerns about policing during the pandemic.	多名活动人士也表达了对警方在疫情期间执法行为的忧虑。

Correspondents say this year's event was given extra impetus by anger over police crackdowns during the Covid-19 lockdown.	前方记者称，由于警方在疫情封锁期间的镇压行为引起群愤，导致今年的抗议人群更为激进。

There was a tight security presence outside the U.S. consulate in the city of Chengdu, China Sunday, as the American staff prepared to leave the premises.	周日，美国驻中国成都总领事馆外安保升级，美方人员准备撤离。
Three moving trucks were seen entering the building compound, while uniformed and plainclothes police lined both sides of the street, which were lined with metal barriers.	三辆搬家卡车驶入馆内，制服警察和便衣警察排列街道两旁，路边设立了金属栅栏。
The editor of China's Global Times tabloid tweeted that the U.S. consulate in Chengdu was given 72 hours to close, or until 10 a.m. (0200GMT) Monday, July 27.	中国《环球时报》编辑发表推文称，美国驻成都总领事馆被要求在 72 小时内关闭，即 7 月 27 日星期一上午 10 点（0200 GMT）。
China charged that some personnel at the Chengdu consulate were "conducting activities not in line with their identities."	中方指责美国驻成都总领事馆的一些人员“从事与其身份不相符的活动”。
Without giving any details, Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs spokesman, Wang Wenbin said such activity had interfered in China's affairs and harmed its security interests.	中国外交部发言人汪文彬没有透露任何细节，只表示这种活动干涉中国内政，损害中国安全利益。
China's order to close the consulate in Chengdu was issued Friday in retaliation for a U.S. order to close the Chinese consulate in Houston, Texas.	中方于周五要求关闭美方驻成都总领事馆，这是对美方要求关闭中方驻德克萨斯州休斯敦总领事馆实施的反制。
Washington ordered China to close the Houston office "to protect American intellectual property and Americans' private information."	华盛顿要求中方关闭驻休斯敦总领事馆“以保护美国的知识产权和美国人的私人信息”。
As Chinese consulate closure in Houston took effect on Friday, a group of men who appeared to be U.S. officials were seen breaking-in to the facility through a back door.	中国驻休斯敦总领事馆于周五关闭之后，一群貌似美国官员的人从后门闯入该场所。
Wang said on Saturday that violated international and bilateral agreements and China would respond, without specifying of how.	汪文斌在周六表示，这一行为严重违反了国际法和双边协定，中方会做出回应，但没有说明具体措施。

Safari park baboons seen armed with knives, screwdrivers and CHAINSAW as 'pranksters give them weapons to wreck cars'	恶作剧者提供毁车武器，动物园内狒狒挥舞起各种工具
The primates at Knowsley safari park, Merseyside, are long known to pounce on anyone pausing in the enclosure and ripping off a windscreen wiper or mirror.	默西塞德郡诺斯利野生动物园的灵长类动物臭名昭著——它们会扑向停在围栏内的汽车，掰下雨刮器或后视镜。
Baboons have been armed with knives, screwdrivers and even chainsaws at Knowsley safari park, Merseyside.	有人看到默西塞德郡诺斯利野生动物园内的狒狒挥舞小刀、起子甚至是链锯。
Workers fear pranksters are arming the pesky primates, who are known to pounce on anyone who pauses and rip off windscreen wipers and mirrors.	工作人员担心有恶作剧者给这些讨厌的灵长类动物提供武器，它们会扑向停下来的汽车，掰下雨刮器或后视镜。
Workers now fear they are being armed with the lethal weapons "for a laugh" by visitors to bolster their attacks and the apes have even been seen rummaging around toolboxes themselves.	现在，工作人员担心游客以“开玩笑”为由给它们提供致命武器，导致其攻击性加强，有人甚至看到这些狒狒乱翻工具箱。
One park worker told The Sunday Times: "We're not sure if they are being given weapons by some of the guests who want to see them attack cars, or if they're fishing them out of pick-up trucks and vans."	一位园区工作人员告诉《星期日泰晤士报》：“我们不确定是想要看到它们袭击汽车的游客给它们提供了武器，还是它们自己从皮卡和货车上偷的。”
"They will literally go into people's toolboxes and carry them around. One of the baboons was seen lugging around a chainsaw."	“它们确实会去翻别人的工具箱并带着到处走。有人看到过狒狒拖着一把链锯。”
Another worker said: "The baboons have been found with knives and screwdrivers. I do wonder if it's some of the guests handing them out."	另一位工作人员说：“我们看到过拿着小刀和起子的狒狒。我在想是不是游客递给它们的。”
And the baboon attacks are so inevitable that mechanics across the northwest of England have come to know the enclosure well.	狒狒袭击时有可见，就连英格兰西北部的修理工都知道这个动物园。

They added that one minute kids want monkeys on the car and the next it has no registration plate - but the issue provides "good money" for the garage.	他们还说，前一分钟孩子们还想看猴子坐到汽车上，后一分钟车牌就不翼而飞，但这样的问题给修理厂带来了“好生意”。
Knowsley reopened on June 15 with Covid-19 security measures after insisting it was as safe as a McDonald's drive-through as visitors do not leave their car on the five mile safari drive.	诺斯利动物园坚称这里就像麦当劳得来速一样安全，只要游客在全程 5 英里的野生动物园参观途中待在车内，动物园于 6 月 15 日重新开放，采取了应对新冠疫情的安全措施。

In 2012 car manufacturer Hyundai let 40 monkeys from the park loose on its New Generation i30 model for 10 hours to prove it had the strength for families with small children.	2012 年，汽车制造商现代公司将其新一代 i30 汽车放在这所动物园内，与 40 只猴子共处 10 个小时，以此证明该车型的强度足以保障有孩子的家庭的人身安全。

Gwyneth Paltrow has said she wants to raise her children to have a good worth ethic as she tries 'not to just hand them things'.	Gwyneth Paltrow 表示，她试图通过“不只是授之以鱼”来教育自己的孩子，希望他们树立起良好的价值观。
Paltrow has two children, Apple (16) and Moses (14), with ex-husband Chris Martin and she wants them to have good values and not get by on their parents fame.	Paltrow 与前夫 Chris Martin 育有两个孩子，分别是 16 岁的 Apple 和 14 岁的 Moses，她希望孩子们树立良好的价值观，而不是依靠父母的名气。
"That's why I think it's so important... To raise a kid that has a work ethic and whose values are aligned with yours or with their own sense of who they are, etc," she told Rob Lowe on his podcast.	“我也是为什么我认为……培养孩子的职业道德，让孩子的价值观与你自身的价值观或是与他们对自己的身份认同一致之类事情十分重要的原因，” 她在播客中告诉 Rob Lowe。
"The truth of the matter is the doors can be opened for you, but if you think about all the people who try and it doesn't happen."	“实际情况是我可以给你指路，但如果你只是像别人那样尝试，不会得出什么结果。”
She added, "As a parent you think, all I can do for these kids is teach them right from wrong and teach them what work is. I've really have tried not to just hand them things."	她补充说：“作为父母，我能够为孩子们做的就是教他们是非对错，教他们工作是什么。我的确尝试过避免只是授之以鱼。”
Paltrow has also taken steps to allow her children to live as privately as possible, and ensures they keep their social media accounts private.	Paltrow 也采取了措施，让孩子们的生活尽可能不被公众关注，确保他们的社交媒体账号保持私密性。
"I won't let them be public on any social media or anything like that, I try to keep them out of the public eye as much as possible," she said.	她说：“我不会通过任何社交媒体或其他方式让他们公开露面，我会尽量让他们避开公众的视线。”
"You know, now it's different, 'cause kids are like, 'Can I have a YouTube channel?' and I'm like, 'No, you can't. Absolutely not."	“你也知道，现在情况不同了，孩子们会问我能不能开个 YouTube 频道，我会告诉他们，‘不行。绝对不可以。’”
Tunisia interior minister named new PM, to form government in a month	突尼斯内政部长接任新总理，将于一个月内组建新政府
Tunisia's Interior Minister Hichem Mechichi has been appointed to form the next government, the president's office said, amid political tensions among major parties in the North African country.	在该北非国家政党关系紧张的情况下，突尼斯总统办公室宣布，任命内政部长 Hichem Mechichi 组建下一届政府。
The 46-year-old lawyer succeeds Elyes Fakhfakh, who resigned as prime minister earlier this month.	这名 46 岁的律师将接替于本月初辞职的 Elyes Fakhfakh。
But Mechichi was not one of the names proposed by the governing political parties to President Kais Saied.	然而，Mechichi 并不在各执政党向 Kais Saied 总统提名的候选人之列。
In a statement following Saturday's announcement, Mechichi said he would "work to form a government that meets the expectations of all Tunisians."	周六宣布新任领导人后，在一份声明中，Mechichi 表示他将“致力于组建一个符合突尼斯人民期望的政府”。
Tunisia has been praised as a rare success story for democratic transition after the Arab Spring regional uprisings sparked by its 2011 revolution.	自 2011 年革命运动引发阿拉伯之春地区起义后，突尼斯被誉为罕见的民主转型成功的典范。
But its leaders have struggled to meet the expectations of the Tunisian people and the already fragile economy has been battered by the closure of the country's borders because of the COVID-19 pandemic.	然而，该国领导人却难以达到人民的期望，新冠疫情导致突尼斯关闭边境，使得本就脆弱的国内经济遭受重击。
The disease has killed nearly 50 people and infected more than 1,400 in Tunisia.	疫情导致约 50 人死亡，感染病例超过 1,400。
As well as being the interior minister in the outgoing government, Mechichi has been a counsellor to President Saied, handling legal matters.	除了在目前的政府中担任内政部长外，Mechichi 还担任 Saied 总统的顾问，负责法律事宜。
He has previously been chief of staff at the Ministry of Transport and also served in the Ministry of Social Affairs.	他曾担任交通部参谋，也在社会事务部任职过。
He now has a month to form a government, which will then face a parliamentary vote of confidence and will need an absolute majority to succeed.	现在，他有一个月时间组建新政府，之后，议会会对新政府举行信任投票，只有获得绝大多数信任票才能通过。
Failing that, parliament will be dissolved and new elections will be held within three months.	否则，议会解散，并在三个月内进行新的选举。

Fakhfakh's resignation on July 15, after less than five months in office, threatened fresh political deadlock in the nation as it struggles with the economic fallout of the pandemic.	Fakhfakh 上任不足五个月便在 7 月 15 日辞职，使得突尼斯面临政治僵局的危险，尤其是在该国仍在设法应对疫情导致的经济困境的情况下。

In his monthly radio address Mann ki Baat, PM Modi said "Pakistan undertook this misadventure with sinister plans to capture India's land and to divert its ongoing internal conflicts."	总理 Modi 在每月一次的广播讲话节目 “Mann ki Baat” 中表示，“巴基斯坦造成了这场灾难，他们制定了阴险的计划来抢夺印度的土地，转移其国内冲突”。
"Pakistan had the audacity of trying to occupy Indian soil and deviate attention from its own internal unrest," he said.	他说：“巴基斯坦厚颜无耻，试图占领印度国土，转移民众对内部动荡的关注。”
"At the time, India was trying for improve relations with Pakistan.	“当时，印度正在努力修复与巴基斯坦的关系。
But as it is said, evil's nature is to fight everyone without reason.	但是，正所谓邪恶的本质就是毫无理由地与所有人作斗争。

That's why Pakistan backstabbed India despite India's attempts at cordial relations," he said.	他说：“这就是为什么巴基斯坦不顾印度为维护关系所做的努力并在背后捅刀子的原因。”

Kargil Diwas is celebrated every year, marking the day the Indian Army recaptured all the Indian posts in Ladakh's Kargil that had been occupied by Pakistan's army 21 years ago.	印度每年都会举行活动庆祝卡吉尔胜利，纪念印度陆军夺回拉达克地区卡吉尔所有印度哨所的日子，这些哨所于 21 年前被巴基斯坦军队占领。
On July 26, 1999, the Army had announced the successful culmination of "Operation Vijay."	1999 年 7 月 26 日，印度陆军宣布 “Vijay 行动”圆满收官。
The nearly three-month battle in the icy heights of Ladakh had claimed the lives of more than 500 Indian soldiers.	这场发生在拉达克地区冰雪高地的战争持续了近三个月，导致逾 500 名印度士兵死亡。

In the decades since Kargil, India-Pakistan relations have been strained following a series of terror strikes.	卡吉尔战争之后的几十年间，印度和巴基斯坦的关系因一系列恐怖袭击一直处于紧张状态。

The small business sector, often under-served by the big banks, has increasingly turned to online lenders to meet its funding needs.	小型企业通常得不到大型银行的青睐，因此越来越频繁地通过网贷机构来满足资金需求。
However, Mr Callaghan said online lenders were disadvantaged compared to the big banks because they did not have access to the same lower priced funding and warned as a result the SME guarantee scheme was not gaining traction.	然而，Callaghan 先生称，与大型银行相比，网贷机构并不具备优势，因为它们无法获得同样的低价资金，他还警告说，中小企业担保方案并不受欢迎。
"I think it has probably missed the mark where all the people who call us, call in the expectation they can get very cheap funding rather than the government backing 50 per cent of the loan," he said.	他说：“我认为这个方案很可能无法达成目的，人们给我们打电话，期望从我们这里获得非常便宜的资金，而不是由政府提供一半的贷款金额。”
"So they call and they get very disappointed because the expectation has been put out there that there is discount pricing and we look at our cost of funding which hasn't changed at all."	“所以给我们打电话后，他们感到非常失望，因为有人表示希望拿到折扣价，而我们的融资成本却没有发生任何变化。”
Mr Callaghan added if fintechs were able to access cheaper funding and pass that on to small businesses the scheme would be a "no brainer."	Callaghan 先生补充道，如果金融科技企业有能力获得成本更低的融资，然后将资金转让给小型企业，那么这样一个方案就会“易如反掌”。“
"It's been a bit of a Catch 22 the major banks have got access to the lower cost funding but they are more risk averse so they don't actually go out to lend in the same way, they can't get access to the data and they can't get comfortable unless you have property," he said "Until we can access that cheaper funding I think there is a fiction out in the market on how popular the scheme is going to be."	“这有点进退两难——大型银行能够以较低的成本获得资金，但他们更希望规避风险，因此他们实际上不会以相同的方式出借资金，他们不能访问数据，除非你有财产抵押，否则他们会没有安全感，” 他说，“除非我们能够获得更便宜的资金，否则我认为市场对这一方案的受欢迎程度抱有幻想。”
Melbourne-based Moula is also participating in the scheme and chief executive Aris Allegos said the benefit of the 50 per cent guarantee, implicit in the government scheme, should be passed on to small businesses but different lenders were handling this in different ways.	位于墨尔本的 Moula 也参与了该方案的制定，首席执行官 Aris Allegos 表示，政府方案中暗示的 50% 担保的收益应当让渡给小型企业，但不同的贷款机构会采取不同的处理方式。
"I can understand there might be others who are not passing through that cost structure," he said.	他说：“我能够理解，其他人可能没有经历过这样的成本结构。”
"That might be a function of how their funding is structured and it might be a function also of which categories they are lending into and how they assess risk within those categories."	“这可能关系到他们的资金结构，也可能关系到他们向哪些类别对象发放贷款以及如何评估这些类别的风险。”
Mr Allegos would not provide details of the number of loans Moula had issued under the scheme but said the revamped scheme was "a core recognition of what needed to change" to offer more flexibility to lenders and borrowers.	Allegos 先生不愿意透露 Moula 根据该方案具体发放了多少贷款，但表示修改后的方案“集中反映了需要做出的改变”，从而为借贷双方带来更大的灵活性。
However, he said his major concern was the "two speed economy" that was operating and the impact this would have on small businesses.	但是，他表示自己非常担心正在运行的“双速经济”及其对小型企业的影响。
"The biggest issue Moula has to face and lenders with respect to small businesses is that proverbial cliff and how to manage into that cliff," he said.	他说：“就小型企业而言，Moula 和贷款机构面临的最大问题是大家所说的悬崖以及如何管理悬崖。”
"Generally speaking with respect to demand we have not returned to pre-COVID levels although appetite is growing."	“总体来说，尽管需求有一定增长，但还没有回到新冠疫情之前的水平。”
ASX-listed online lender Prospa also would not detail the amount of loans it had issued under the scheme as it said the information was commercially sensitive but chief executive Greg Moshal said the goverment's extension of the scheme was welcome.	在澳大利亚证券交易所挂牌的网贷机构 Prospa 也不愿透露其根据方案发放的贷款额度，称这些属于商业敏感信息，但首席执行官 Greg Moshal 表示，政府扩展该方案的举措颇受欢迎。
"We support any enhancements to the scheme that will enable small businesses to access a wide range of funding products that meet their requirements, including flexible cash flow products over shorter terms," he said.	他说：“我们支持对该方案做出的各种增强，这些增强措施使得小型企业能够获得满足其需求的各种融资产品，包括灵活的短期现金流产品。”
Virginia Beach takes down Confederate monument	弗吉尼亚海滩市拆除南部同盟纪念碑
VIRGINIA BEACH, Va. -- The city of Virginia Beach removed a 115-year-old Confederate monument from public grounds on Saturday, less than two days after the City Council voted unanimously to do so.	弗吉尼亚海滩（弗吉尼亚）——周日，弗吉尼亚海滩市从公共区拆除了一座已有 115 年历史的南部同盟纪念碑。两天前，市议会一致决定对其进行拆除。
Workers took down the 27-foot (8.2-meter) tall monument on Saturday morning, media outlets reported.	据媒体报道，工人于周六早上拆除了这座 27 英尺（8.2 米）高的纪念碑。
It was installed in 1905 and stood outside the old Princess Anne County courthouse, in the same place that slave auctions were once held.	该纪念碑在 1905 年立于原来的安妮公主县法院外，奴隶拍卖会也曾在此进行。
The council voted unanimously Thursday night to begin the removal process.	周四晚，市议会一致决定开展相关拆除工作。
The council had listened to dozens of speakers and decided the monument is viewed by many as divisive and a painful reminder of the past.	市议会听取了几十位发言人的看法，认为该纪念碑对许多人而言意味着分裂，且不断让人想起悲痛的往事。
The statue recently had been completely covered, with a locked gate around it following recent protests and vandalism at other Confederate monuments.	鉴于最近针对其他几座纪念碑发生的抗议和破坏事件，目前这座纪念碑已经被完全遮盖起来，并在周围安置了上锁的大门。
The monument will be stored for now.	该纪念碑将暂时留存。
The city now must wait for any offers from historical groups or other entities that might want to take the monument.	该市现在需要等待愿意处理这座纪念碑的历史组织或其他相关实体的响应。
Police try new, less-lethal tools as protests continue	抗议活动持续，警方尝试使用新型低致命性工具
As violent clashes continue between law enforcement and protesters in Portland and around the country, debate is swirling around how police can cut back on lethal force.	在波特兰以及全国各地，执法人员与示威者之间的暴力冲突不断，围绕如何减少警方使用致命武器的争论甚嚣尘上。
Some companies are stepping up to offer new high-tech tools like remote handcuffs for police to use instead of the more dangerous options like pepper spray, rubber bullets and flash grenades.	一些公司正在加大力度提供警用遥控手铐等新型高科技工具，用来代替胡椒喷雾、橡皮子弹和闪光弹等危险性更高的武器。
Human rights group Amnesty International analyzed 500 videos from protests from May 26 through June 5 and found 125 incidents of excessive force across 40 states and the District of Columbia.	人权组织大赦国际对 5 月 26 日至 6 月 5 日期间抗议活动的 500 个视频进行了分析，在 40 个州和哥伦比亚特区发现了 125 起过度使用武力的情况。
"We saw a misuse of tear gas, pepper spray, pepper balls, 40 millimeter impact rounds, basically every combination of less-lethal weapon being used in inappropriate ways," said Amnesty International weapons investigator Brian Castner.	大赦国际武器调查员 Brian Castner 表示：“我们看到了滥用催泪瓦斯、胡椒喷雾、胡椒球、40 毫米撞击弹的情况，基本上都是以不适当的方式组合使用各种低致命性武器。”
Still, some insist that having options is important for avoiding the need for a firearm.	一部分人仍然坚持这样一个观点——有选择对于避免使用枪支而言十分重要。
"All of these devices should be at hand for the cops to use other than deadly physical force being used by a firearm because it's the only profession in America where the citizens give you the right to take your life," said Corey Pegues, former New York Police Department Deputy Inspector.	前纽约警察局副督察 Corey Pegues 表示：“我们应当为警员提供各种随身装备，而不是使用枪支这样的致命武器，因为警察在美国是唯一一种由公民赋予权力夺取人性命的职业。”
One of the newest tools is called the Bola Wrap, a handheld device that shoots out an 8-foot Kevlar cord that wraps around a suspect.	有一款最新工具叫做套索 (Bola Wrap)，这是一种手持式装备，可以发射长 8 英尺的凯夫拉绳索缠绕住犯罪嫌疑人。
There are Long Range Acoustic Devices, also known as sound canons, directed energy weapons that use lasers to heat a person's skin, new projectiles made from things like foam and chalk, stink bombs, and of course the Taser.	其他新型装备还包括远距离声波设备（也称做声波加农炮）、使用激光加热人体皮肤的定向能量发射武器、由泡沫和白垩粉之类的材料制成的新型炮弹、臭弹以及电击枪。
Shares of Axon, the company that makes the Taser, spiked more than 18%, reaching all-time highs when protests turned violent days after the police killing of George Floyd.	在 George Floyd 被警察杀害后的几天内，抗议活动演变为暴力事件，电击枪制造企业 Axon 的股价上涨超过 18％，创下历史新高。
The market for less-lethal weapons is expected to reach $11.85 billion by 2023.	预计到 2023 年，低致命性武器的市场总额将达到 118.5 亿美元。
Watch the video to get a look at the new high-tech tools police are using for less-lethal force, how they're regulated, and what's at stake for the future of policing and the communities they serve.	观看视频，了解警方使用的新型高科技低致命性工具，了解如何监管这些工具的使用以及它们会给未来的治安维护和社区带来哪些风险。
UN says thousands of anti-Pakistan militants in Afghanistan	联合国称阿富汗驻扎有数千名巴基斯坦叛乱武装分子
ISLAMABAD -- A U.N. report says more than 6,000 Pakistani insurgents are hiding in Afghanistan, most belonging to the outlawed Pakistani Taliban group responsible for attacking Pakistani military and civilian targets.	伊斯兰堡——联合国报告称，有超过 6,000 名巴基斯坦叛乱分子藏匿在阿富汗，其中大多数为非法的巴基斯坦塔利班组织，负责袭击巴基斯坦军用和民用目标。
The report released this week said the group, known as the Tehreek-e-Taliban (TTP), has linked up with the Afghan-based affiliate of the Islamic State group.	根据本周发布的报告，这个被称为 Tehreek-e-Taliban (TTP) 的组织与伊斯兰国 (IS) 组织的阿富汗分支有相关联系。
Some of TTP's members have even joined the IS affiliate, which has its headquarters in eastern Afghanistan.	一些 TTP 的成员甚至加入了基地位于阿富汗东部的隶属于 IS 的组织。
The Afghan government did not respond Sunday to requests by The Associated Press for comment.	周日，阿富汗政府并未回复美联社对相关问题进行评论的请求。
The report said IS in Afghanistan, known as IS in Khorasan province, has been hit hard by Afghan security forces as well as U.S. and NATO forces, and even on occasion by the Afghan Taliban.	据报道称，阿富汗境内的 IS （即霍拉桑省 IS）受到阿富汗安全部队以及美国和北约部队的重创，有时还会遭受阿富汗塔利班的的袭击。
The report was prepared by the U.N. analytical and sanctions monitoring team, which tracks terrorist groups around the world.	该报告由分析支持和制裁监测小组撰写，该小组负责追踪世界各地的恐怖组织。
The report estimated the membership of IS in Afghanistan at 2,200, and while its leadership has been depleted, IS still counts among its leaders a Syrian national Abu Said Mohammad al-Khorasani.	报告估计，阿富汗的 IS 组织成员有 2,200 人，尽管其领导层被削弱，但该组织仍将一名叙利亚公民——Abu Said Mohammad al-Khorasani——视为头领之一。
The report also said the monitoring team had received information that two senior Islamic State commanders, Abu Qutaibah and Abu Hajar al-Iraqi, had recently arrived in Afghanistan from the Middle East.	报告还提到，监测小组有消息称两名 IS 高级指挥官 Abu Qutaibah 和 Abu Hajar al-Iraqi 从中东抵达阿富汗。
"Although in territorial retreat, (the Islamic State) remains capable of carrying out high-profile attacks in various parts of the country, including Kabul.	报告写道，“IS 占领的领土虽然在减少，但他们仍然有能力在该国包括喀布尔在内的各个地区造成一定规模的袭击。
It also aims to attract Taliban fighters who oppose the agreement with the United States," the report said, referring to a U.S. peace deal signed with the Taliban in February.	该组织还想要拉拢反对同美国签署协议的塔利班战士”。此处的协议指美国在二月份与塔利班签署的和平协议。
That deal was struck to allow the U.S. to end its 19-year involvement in Afghanistan, and calls on the Taliban to guarantee its territory will not be used by terrorist groups.	这项协议的目的是为了让美国得以结束其在阿富汗 19 年之久的战争，并希望塔利班保证其领土不会被恐怖组织使用。
The deal is also expected to guarantee the Taliban's all-out participation in the fight against IS.	预计该协议还将确保塔利班全力投入到打击 IS 的战斗中。
The second and perhaps most critical part of the agreement calls for talks between the Taliban and Kabul's political leadership.	协议第二部分——可能也是最重要的部分——则呼吁塔利班和喀布尔的政治领袖进行会谈。
Late Saturday, the U.S. State Department issued a statement saying its peace envoy Zalmay Khalilzad was again shuttling through the region seeking to jump start those negotiations, which have been repeatedly postponed as both sides squabble over a prisoner release program.	周六晚些时候，美国国务院发表声明，称其和平特使 Zalmay Khalilzad 仍忙碌奔波于该地区，试图推动因双方在囚犯释放计划上的争执而一再推迟的谈判事宜。
The U.S.-backed deal calls for the Afghan government to release 5,000 Taliban prisoners and the Taliban to free 1,000 government and military personnel as a so-called good will gesture ahead of talks.	这项美国支持的协议呼吁阿富汗政府释放 5,000 名塔利班囚犯，相应地，塔利班则需释放 1,000 名政府和军方人员，作为双方谈判前抛出的橄榄枝。
Until now the government is refusing to release nearly 600 Taliban prisoners it calls high-profile criminals and has offered to free alternatives.	目前，阿富汗政府拒绝释放其中约 600 名塔利班囚犯，并称之为高调犯罪者，但提议仅释放剩余的囚犯。
The Taliban have refused.	塔利班方面则拒绝了政府的提议。
"The parties are closer than ever to the start of intra-Afghan negotiations, the key next step to ending Afghanistan's 40-year long war," said the U.S. State Department statement.	“这是历史上双方最接近开展内部谈判的一次机会，亦是结束 40 年之久阿富汗战争的下一步关键举措”，美国国务院表示，
"Although significant progress has been made on prisoner exchanges, the issue requires additional effort to fully resolve."	“虽然在交换囚犯方面取得了重要进展，但仍然需要进一步的努力才能解决问题。”
The Taliban's political spokesman earlier this week said it was ready to hold talks with Kabul's political leaders after the Islamic holiday of Eid al-Adha at the end of the month, providing the prisoner release is completed.	本周早些时候，塔利班的政治发言人表示，塔利班计划在月底古尔邦节（伊斯兰节日）结束后与喀布尔的政治领袖举行会谈，但前提是先要完成囚犯释放工作。
A big worry for Pakistan is the presence in Afghanistan of militants, particularly linked to the TTP or Jamaat-ul-Ahrar or Lashkar-e-Islam, as well as those with the Baluchistan Liberation Army, which has taken responsibility for high-profile attacks this month in the southern Sindh province as well as in southwestern Baluchistan Province.	最令巴基斯坦担忧的问题就是阿富汗境内的武装分子，尤其是与 TTP、Jamaat-ul-Ahrar、Lashkar-e-Islam 或俾路支解放军有关联的武装分子，俾路支解放军在该月对信德省南部及俾路支省西南部发动了规模袭击。
Several Pakistan military personnel have been killed this month in southwestern Baluchistan province in battle with insurgents.	多名巴基斯坦军人在俾路支省西南部与武装分子的交战中牺牲。
The TTP took responsibility for one of the most horrific attacks in Pakistan in 2014, when a Pakistani army school was attacked and 140 were killed.	TTP 组织在 2014 年对巴基斯坦发动了极为恐怖的一次袭击，导致巴基斯坦陆军学院 140 人死亡，
Most were students, and some were as young as 5.	其中多数为学生，有的年仅 5 岁。
"The total number of Pakistani foreign terrorist fighters in Afghanistan, posing a threat to both countries, is estimated at between 6,000 and 6,500, most of them with TTP," the report said.	报告称，“驻扎在阿富汗的巴基斯坦境外恐怖势力威胁着两个国家的安全，粗略估计其人数为 6,000 至 6,500 人，其中大多数为 TTP 组织成员”。
Top British bank HSBC denies "setting up trap" for China's Huawei in US investigations - RT Business News	英国最大银行汇丰银行否认在美国调查中对中国企业华为“设陷阱”——RT 电视台商业新闻
London-headquartered multinational bank HSBC took to social media to say it was not, as Chinese media claimed, "fabricating evidence" against Huawei, which led to the arrest of the company's chief financial officer in Canada.	总部位于伦敦的跨国银行汇丰银行（HSBC）通过社交媒体表示，该行没有像中国媒体报道的那样针对华为“捏造证据”，导致华为首席财务官在加拿大被捕。
In a now-unavailable post on WeChat, the lender said that its actions did not trigger US investigations into the world's largest supplier of telecommunications network equipment, as the scrutiny of Huawei for allegedly violating US sanctions on Iran began well before the bank's involvement in late 2016.	一篇现已不可见的微信文章中写道，银行表示他们的行为并没有引发美国对这家全球最大的电信网络设备供应商展开调查，因为对华为涉嫌违反美国对伊朗制裁的审查早在银行介入之前的 2016 年下半年就已经开始。
"HSBC does not have any hostility towards Huawei and did not "frame" Huawei," the bank said on Saturday, adding that it would never distort any facts about its clients.	银行于周六表示，“汇丰银行对华为没有任何敌意，不存在‘构陷’华为”的情况，并补充说绝不会扭曲有关客户的任何事实。
"In response to US DOJ's [US Justice Department] requests for information, HSBC Group simply presented the objective facts.	“为了对美国司法部（US DOJ）要求提供的信息做出回应，汇丰集团只是陈述了客观事实。

The post has been blocked on the platform with a note that it "violates regulations" and is not available now.	平台屏蔽了这篇文章，提示其“违反规定”，目前已经看不到文章内容。
The statement comes shortly after multiple Chinese media outlets, including state-linked newspapers, accused HSBC of "conspiring" with Washington to set a trap for Huawei.	在多家中国媒体（包括有政府背景的报社）指责汇丰银行与华盛顿“密谋串通”为华为设下陷阱后，汇丰银行迅速作出这一说明。
The company has been at the epicenter of a diplomatic scandal for more than a year and a half since Huawei CFO Meng Wanzhou was arrested in December 2018 in Canada on a warrant from the US.	2018 年 12 月，加拿大警方应美国相关部门要求拘捕华为首席财务官孟晚舟，此后一年半的时间里，这家公司一直是外交新闻的焦点。
Meng faces fraud charges for allegedly using a shell company to violate sanctions against Iran and allegedly lying to banks about the link between Huawei and Iranian company Skycom.	孟晚舟涉嫌利用空壳公司违反对伊朗的制裁，并且向银行隐瞒华为与伊朗公司 Skycom 之间的关系，因而面临欺诈指控。
According new evidence cited by the Global Times, HSBC was well aware of the Chinese company's relationship with Skycom.	《环球时报》援引的新证据显示，汇丰银行此前非常清楚这家中国公司与 Skycom 之间的关系。
The bank reportedly opted to "collude" with the US government to escape more severe punishment in 2012, when the bank had to admit to money laundering and sanctions violations, including restrictions on Iran.	据报道，该行选择与美国政府“勾结”，为的是逃避在 2012 年受到的更严厉的处罚，当年汇丰银行被迫承认洗钱和违反制裁，其中就包括对伊朗的禁令。
It was ordered at the time to pay around $1.9 billion in penalties and to prevent any similar misconduct.	当时该行被勒令缴纳约 19 亿美元罚金，并需要采取措施防范类似不当行为。
"The evidence indicated that HSBC understood this relationship but intentionally sold out its customer's confidential business documents to the US side so that the US government could overlook the British bank's own misconduct and not punish it under the 2012 Deferred Prosecution Agreement," the newspaper said in one of its articles on the matter.	在一篇针对此事件的文章中该报写道：“有证据表明，汇丰银行清楚地知道这一层关系，但刻意将客户的机密商业文件出售给美方，为的就是让美国政府忽略这家英国银行自身的不当行为，逃避根据 2012《暂缓起诉协议》应受的处罚。”
In a veiled warning, the Beijing-controlled newspaper added that the lender, if proven to be guilty of this "collusion," could face "harsh punishment" in China, one of the major markets for HSBC.	这份由中国政府控制的报纸在公开警告中补充表示，如果证实银行存在“勾结”行为，可能会在中国（汇丰的主要市场之一）对其施以“严厉处罚”。
It is not the first time the renowned bank has come under fire in recent weeks.	最近几周，这家知名银行已多次受到责难。
Last month, HSBC was lambasted for supporting the new national security law for Hong Kong, the city where its business started and which accounts for over half of its profits.	上个月，汇丰银行因支持在香港实施新国家安全法而受到抨击，香港是汇丰的业务发源地，贡献了一半以上的利润。
The bank faced criticism from both sides - from the West, with US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo calling the endorsement a "corporate kowtow," and the East, with the Chinese side reportedly saying that its support was "belated."	汇丰银行陷入了两面不讨好的窘境：在西方，美国国务卿 Mike Pompeo 称其“卑躬屈膝”；在东方，中国媒体则表示其支持“姗姗来迟”。
Angola: Pedalé Hospital Assigned to Health Ministry	安哥拉：Pedalé 医院移交卫生部监管
Luanda - The President of the Republic, João Lourenço, determined this Friday the transfer of the supervision of the Pedro Maria Tonha Pedalé Hospital, under construction in Luanda, to the sphere of the Ministry of Health.	罗安达——共和国总统 João Lourenço 于本周五决定，将位于罗安达正在建设中的 Pedro Maria Tonha Pedalé 医院的监管权移交卫生部。
In a note, the Press Office of the President of the Republic informs that the measure aims to materialize the Government principle of construction and expansion of the network of public hospitals to ensure better medical care and medication to the population.	共和国总统新闻办公室在一份声明文件中表示，此举旨在落实政府的建设原则，扩大医院网络，确保公众得到更好的医疗和药品服务。
"In this specific case, the idea is to make available to Angolans a reference hospital, differentiated and equipped with modern technology and high precision in the diagnosis and treatment of diseases of high complexity," the document reads.	文件还提到，“在当前特殊情况下，该措施使得安哥拉人民能够拥有一家差异化的具有参考价值的医院，它配备有现代技术和用于诊断及治疗复杂疾病的精密仪器。”
It stresses that the decision of the Angolan Head of State also takes into account the demographic growth of the country, which has motivated a "huge demand" for quality health services in the most diverse specialties.	文中强调，安哥拉总统的决定也考虑到了该国人口的增长，这推动了人们对最为多样化的高质量保健服务的“庞大需求”。
This demand, the note continues, justifies with the inclusion in the hospital specialized for the treatment of complex diseases, teaching and research, interventions related to ophthalmology and maternal-infant medicine, areas whose strategy and management deserve to be under the responsibility of the Ministry of Health.	文件还指出，这一需求十分合理，因为医院囊括了与眼科和母婴医学相关的复杂疾病治疗、教学研究和干预，而这些领域的策略和管理理应属于卫生部的责任范畴。
Algeria: Mahmoud Guemama's Death - Algeria Loses a Patriot, Committed Militant, Says President Tebboune.	阿尔及利亚：Tebboune 总统哀悼 Mahmoud Ghamama——阿尔及利亚痛失一位爱国者，一名坚定的战士。
Algiers - President of the Republic, Abdelmadjid Tebboune, sent a message of condolences to members of the People's National Assembly (APN), Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama, who died Friday, in which he said that Algeria "has lost a patriot and a militant committed to the causes of his people and his nation."	阿尔及尔——共和国总统 Abdelmadjid Tebboune 向于周五逝世的全国人民议会议员 Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama 表示哀悼，并表示阿尔及利亚“痛失一位爱国者，一名投身于人民和祖国大业的战士”。
Algeria loses today, by the death of Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama, a patriot and a militant committed to the causes of his people and his nation, a man who has never wavered and whose determination remained intact from the moment he took up arms, alongside his valiant Mujahedeen brothers, until his last breath on this sad day when we can only resign ourselves to God's will," President Tebboune wrote in his message of condolence.	Tebboune 总统在吊唁信中写道：“今天，Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama 离开了，阿尔及利亚痛失一位爱国者，一名投身于人民和祖国大业的战士，他从拿起武器的那一刻起就未曾动摇过，他的决心坚定不移，他与英勇的圣战者兄弟们并肩奋战，直到他在这个令我们悲痛万分的日子里咽下最后一口气，而我们只能尊听主的旨意。”
"The late Mahmoud Guemama, peace be upon him, belonged to a unique generation of faithful patriotic militants who sacrificed themselves for their homeland," added President of the Republic.	“已故的 Mahmoud Guemama——愿他安息——生于特别的一代，他们是充满信念、为国捐躯的爱国战士。”
"The deceased devoted his life to the liberation of Algeria from the torments of abject colonialism, by joining the ranks of the Revolution in the prime of life in 1960 in the Tahart training camp of the historic wilaya VI."	“1960 年，他们在生命最辉煌的时期加入了 Wilaya VI 的 Tahart 训练营，加入了革命的队列，从卑劣的殖民主义魔爪中解放了阿尔及利亚，献出了自己的生命。”
"The late President is known to all for his proven militancy and his commitment to anchoring the image of a prosperous and united Algeria," said President Tebboune.	“这位已故的领导人具有战斗精神，投身于建设一个团结繁荣的阿尔及利亚，他的名字也因此家喻户晓。”
"In the far south, the late Mahmoud Guemama enjoys great renown as a mediator, intervening to reconcile brothers in the same country whenever the fire of discord is kindled," added the President in his message.	总统补充道：“在遥远的南方地区，Mahmoud Guemama 是备受敬仰的调解者，一旦不和的火花被擦亮，他便置身其中，帮助同胞们达成和解。”
"All these qualities and values earned the late Mahmoud Guemama the respect and trust of the people of Tamanrasset who chose him to represent them in the People's National Assembly (APN) for several terms, during which he was the ambassador and defender of the concerns of the region and the aspirations of its people, and even the representative and spokesman of all Algerians," wrote the President of the Republic.	“这些品质和价值观让 Mahmoud Guemama 赢得了塔曼拉塞特人民的尊重和信任，推举他在全国人民议会中担任多个任期的人民代表，它是该地区人民关心的问题和人民意愿的大使和捍卫者，也是所有阿尔及利亚人民的代言人。”
"All expressions of condolence will not be enough to pay tribute to the mujahed Mahmoud Guemama, peace be upon him.	“没有任何吊唁足以歌颂 Mujahed Mahmoud Guemama，愿他安息。
He is leaving us today at a time when Algeria needs him," said the President.	今天，他在阿尔及利亚最需要他的时刻离开了我们”，总统说。
"I pray to Almighty God to surround the deceased with His Holy Mercy, to welcome him in His vast paradise alongside the shuhadaa and virtuous.	最后，Tebboune 总统说：“我向全能的真主祷告，让逝者沐浴在您圣洁慈悲的光芒中，在无垠的天堂，与 shuhadaa 和贤者们一同迎接他的到来。
I also pray to God to lend his family and loved ones patience and comfort...there is no strength or power except in God," the President of the Republic concluded.	我祈求真主给予他的家人和爱人耐心与慰藉......唯有您有无上的力量。”
Coronavirus Travel Update: Which Countries Have Travel Restriction for Bulgarians Upon Entry	新冠疫情旅行指南：对保加利亚旅客实施入境限制的国家
The number of countries imposing travel restrictions is growing. As of this week, the Czech Republic wants coronavirus tests for Bulgarian seasonal workers. Denmark allows Bulgarians on its territory only if they have an address registration there, an employment contract or a document certifying a business trip.	实行旅行限制的国家越来越多。从本周开始，捷克共和国希望对保加利亚季节工进行新冠病毒检测。丹麦规定，只有在该国登记了住所、拥有雇佣合同或商务旅行证明文件的保加利亚公民才能入境。

For the next 14 days, access to southern Romania was denied without good reason. And Greece has tightened measures even more along its land borders.	奥地利规定，即使 PCR 测试结果为阴性，也需要接受强制性居家隔离。德国对入境人员也实施了相同的政策。在未来 14 天，如果没有充分的理由，不得进入罗马尼亚南部。希腊在其陆地边境采取了更严格的措施。
From Tuesday, those traveling by plane from Bulgaria to Greece will have to present to the Greek border authorities a negative result from a PCR test for coronavirus, performed up to 72 hours before their entry into our southern neighbor, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced.	外交部宣布，自周二起，从保加利亚飞抵希腊的人员必须向希腊边境机构出示新冠病毒 PCR 测试阴性证明，测试需要在进入希腊南部邻国之前的 72 小时内完成。
They added that only passengers who have a certificate for such a test will be allowed in the country. It must be issued in English and contain the three names and numbers of the passenger's passport or identity card. The authorities in our southern neighbor will not accept certificates that do not meet these requirements	他们还宣布，旅客必须持有相应的测试证明才允许入境。证明必须以英文出具，包含旅客护照或身份证上的对应的三个名字和编号。如果证明不符合以上要求，南部邻国当局则不会接受。
"Travelers should be tested in the laboratory by RT-PCR by taking secretions from the mouth or nose. Tests for coronavirus will be recognized if they are performed in national reference laboratories, national health laboratories or private laboratories that are accredited by the relevant national accreditation bodies (not necessarily specifically for COVID-19).	“旅客需通过提取口/鼻分泌物的方式在实验室完成 RT-PCR 测试。接受的测试结果包括在国家参考实验室、国家卫生实验室或得到相关国家认证机构认证的私人实验室（不一定是专门针对新冠病毒实验室）进行新冠病毒测试后得到的结果。
The measure does not apply to Greek citizens, citizens residing in Greece and travelers for significant professional reasons.	希腊公民、定居希腊的公民以及有重大专业原因的旅客不适用该措施。
The Greek Ministry of Foreign Affairs also announced that on Tuesday, July 28, and Wednesday, July 29, passengers who did not have time to be tested before their trip will be tested by the competent Greek authorities upon arrival in Greece.	希腊外交部还宣布，7 月 28 日（星期二）和 7 月 29 日（星期三）抵达希腊的旅客，如果在出发之前没有来得及进行测试，将在抵达后由希腊当局进行检测。

More information is published on travel.gov.gr	下列要求依然有效：搭乘飞机前往希腊的旅客必须提前至少 24 小时填写电子版《旅客定位表》（PLF）生成二维码，并在抵达希腊境内后向希腊当局提交该表格。更多信息参见 travel.gov.gr
At the moment there is no change in the requirements for crossing the land borders between Bulgaria and Greece. Previous guests include Princess Diana, whose hair caught fire thanks to a spark from a grenade thrown during an exercise in 1983.	戴安娜王妃也曾到访过这里，在 1983 年的一次训练中，她的秀发不慎被投出的手榴弹的火花点着。

Cummings 先生曾经抱怨军事采购“继续在让几十亿英镑打水漂”，他最近出席了在 MI5 和 MI6 总部召开的会议，也有计划参观位于多塞特郡普尔市的 SBS 总部以及位于威尔特郡波顿唐的国家绝密实验室。
