Thomas Cook pension trustees plot deal to salvage payouts	托马斯库克养老金信托设法抢救养老金支付
Thomas Cook's pension funds have kicked off talks with specialist insurers about a deal to salvage the collapsed travel group's retirement scheme benefits.	托马斯库克养老金基金已开始与专业保险公司谈判，以抢救该倒闭旅游集团的退休福利。
Sky News has learnt that Steve Southern, chair of the trustees, is holding talks with several parties about a buyout deal that would avoid most of Thomas Cook's 14,000 pension scheme members facing a steep cut to their payments.	天空新闻获悉，信托主席Steve Southern正与多方谈判，以达成控股权收购协议，避免大幅削减托马斯库克14000名养老金计划大部分成员的养老福利。
Any deal with an insurer would be likely to involve a more modest cut to payouts than the 10% triggered by a pension scheme's transfer into the Pension Protection Fund (PPF) lifeboat.	与保险公司达成的任何协议都可减少养老金的削减幅度，否则需将养老金计划的10%转入养老金保护基金（PPF）救生艇。
The discussions are at a very preliminary stage and - even if successful - will not result in a deal until after the Thomas Cook schemes have been through an assessment by the PPF.	谈判仍处于初级阶段，哪怕谈判成功，也要等到PPF评估托马斯库克养老计划后才可达成交易。
Thomas Cook bosses face investigation into what led to collapse	托马斯库克管理层面临破产原因调查
That period could take up to two years, and if the schemes do enter the PPF will result in roughly 10,000 future pensioners having their payouts cut by 10%.	该阶段可能长达2年，如养老计划最终加入PPF，这将导致约10000名未来的养老金领取人养老金减少10%。
Sources said that a number of pension risk transfer specialists, as well as at least one of the new "superfund" consolidation vehicles, were in talks with Thomas Cook's trustees about a deal.	有消息称，数名养老金风险转移专家以及至少一种新的“超级基金”合并工具正在与托马斯库克受托人就交易进行谈判。
News of the trustees' efforts to secure members' benefits comes four days after Britain's oldest tour operator ceased trading, sparking an international repatriation programme and triggering thousands of job losses.	这家英国旅行社鼻祖停止经营，引发了全球性的游客遣返，成千上万人失业。四天后，开始传出受托人正设法保障成员利益的消息。
Thomas Cook's descent into insolvency has sparked a bitter blame game, with board members, government ministers and auditors all facing demands to explain their actions in the months before its collapse.	托马斯库克的破产也引发了激烈的互相归咎。董事会成员、政府部长和审计师都被要求解释其在破产前几个月内的行动。
The company's four pension schemes are well-funded, with a £100m surplus on a PPF basis, according to the latest figures.	最新数据显示，该公司的四项养老金计划资金充裕，按PPF方案有1亿英镑盈余。
Collectively, they hold assets worth about £1.5bn.	公司拥有总计约15亿英镑资产。
However, as Sky News revealed last month, the trustees' demands for better terms in Thomas Cook's proposed rescue deal added a further complication to efforts to get the transaction across the line.	然而，正如天空新闻上个月透露的消息，受托人要求满足托马斯库克提出的救助计划中更有利的条款，为交易的顺利达成增添一重困难。
Thomas Cook's liquidation brought to an end 178 years of solvent trading, prompting the launch of inquiries by the government's Insolvency Service, the accounting watchdog and an influential committee of MPs.	托马斯库克的清算，为其178年的经营画上句号，也促使政府破产服务、会计监督机构及国会议员组成的重要委员会介入调查。
Ministers have established a taskforce to address the crisis, which has left creditors facing meagre returns from the post-insolvency sale of assets.	部长们建立了一个特别专家组以应对危机，让债权人获得破产后资产出售的微薄回报。
To date, just under half of Thomas Cook's overseas British customers have been flown home.	截至目前，滞留海外的托马斯库克英国游客中，近一半已飞回国内。
Its collapse came hours after Thomas Cook issued a last-gasp plea to its lenders to reduce a £200m funding demand.	托马斯库克最后一次向要求偿还2亿英镑的贷方请求减少偿还金额，未果之后数小时宣告破产。
What went so wrong for Thomas Cook?	托马斯库克到底错在何处？
The talks, which concluded without a deal on Sunday evening, represented a frantic last throw of the dice for a company which had been forced to seek more than £1bn in new funding following a £1.5bn half-year loss and deteriorating trading.	周日晚仍未达成任何协议的谈判，代表了这家公司最后的疯狂一搏。由于半年亏损15亿英镑以及经营情况不断恶化，该公司不得不寻求超过10亿英镑的额外资金。
Thomas Cook was founded in 1841 by a 32-year-old cabinet-maker and former Baptist preacher who began offering one-day rail excursions from Leicester to Loughborough for a shilling.	托马斯库克在1841年由一位32岁的橱柜制造商及前浸礼会牧师创立。他开始组织莱斯特到拉夫堡的火车一日游，收费1先令。
From there, it went on to become one of the world's largest holiday companies, marking its 175th anniversary three years ago.	自那以后，公司逐渐成为全球最大的旅游度假公司之一，三年前庆祝其成立175周年。
A PPF spokesperson said: "Insolvency events, like the liquidation of Thomas Cook, are exactly why the PPF was set up.	一位PPF发言人说：“破产事件，比如托马斯库克的清算，正是PPF成立的原因。”
"We are here to protect the financial futures of members belonging to defined benefit pension schemes and they should take comfort knowing we are here to protect them."	“我们存在的目的就是保护固定收益养老计划成员的金融期货。他们知道我们在保护他们，应该会稍感安慰。“
A spokesman for Thomas Cook's pension trustees declined to comment on Friday.	托马斯库克养老金信托发言人周五拒绝发表评论。
Adorable pictures show new-born rhino nuzzling her mother and exploring new home	初生犀牛依偎在母亲身旁探索新家，照片惹人爱
Baby Stella was welcomed into the world at Cotswold Wildlife Park, Oxfordshire, earlier this month and is the first female born to parents Monty and Ruby.	本月早些时候，牛津郡科茨沃尔德野生公园迎来犀牛宝宝Stella。她是父母Monty和Ruby的第一个女儿。
The youngster, who is healthy and nursing well, can be seen wondering about her enclosure before resting alongside her mother on a bed of straw.	我们可以看到小家伙身体健康，哺乳情况良好，在围栏内四处走动，最后在妈妈身边的干草堆上休息。
Mother Ruby joined the wildlife park in 2009 alongside another female called Nancy in the hope that one would produce the park's first ever calf with Monty.	妈妈Ruby和另一头母犀Nancy一起，在2009年来到这个野生公园，承载着与Monty共同产下公园的第一头幼仔的期望。
Nancy then gave birth to a female named Astrid in 2013, with Stella being the third female calf born at the park in its 49-year history.	Nancy在2013年产下一头名为Astrid的母犀，Stella则是该公园49年历史上出生的第三头母犀。
Jamie Craig, curator of Cotswold Wildlife Park, said: 'We have had tremendous success with our current rhino herd.	科茨沃尔德园长Jamie Craig说：'我们目前犀牛种群情况极佳。
'Stella is the sixth youngster from Nancy and Ruby and our bull, Monty, has proved to be an excellent dad.	'Stella是Nancy和Ruby的第六只幼仔，而我们公犀牛Monty的表现，证明他是一位好父亲。
'He is the perfect combination of a dominant bull and caring patriarch.	'他是优势雄犀和体贴家长的完美结合。
'It is particularly satisfying that Ruby has produced a female calf - these are vital for the development of the breeding programme and Stella will eventually move to another collection to hopefully become a successful mother herself.'	'Ruby产下母犀是一件特别令人满足的事——这对繁殖计划的发展十分关键，Stella最终会加入另一个动物园，但愿她也能成为一位成功的母亲。'
Ruby has had two boys before, Ian in 2015 and Alan in 2017. Alan is still at the park whilst Ian is in Torino Zoo in Italy	此前，Ruby已经产下两头雄犀，即2015年出生的Ian和2017年出生的Alan。Alan没有离开，Ian则在意大利的都灵动物园
When Alan was just one-week old he weighed around eleven stone.	Alan一周大的时候，体重大约11英石。
Births in captivity are considered extremely rare. Females only reproduce every two-and-a-half to five years, so the window of opportunity for successful reproduction is limited.	圈养犀牛的生产是极为罕见的。雌性每两年半到五年只生产一次，所以有机会繁育成功的时段非常有限。
According to the park, a typical gestation period lasts between sixteen to eighteen months, after which a single calf is born.	园方表示，其妊娠期一般为16至18个月，之后会有一头幼犀出生。
It is considered the longest gestation periods of any land mammal, surpassed only by the twenty-two month gestation period of an Elephant.	人们普遍认为这是陆生哺乳动物中妊娠期最长的一种，仅次于妊娠期为22个月的大象。
A newborn Rhino calf will stand up within one hour of birth. Once born, the calf will immediately attempt to suckle, although he or she may be a little unsteady on their feet for the first few days.	新生犀牛会在出生后一小时内站立。一旦出生，幼犀会立即试图吮吸。不过在初生前几天，幼犀可能还有点站立不稳。
It will remain under the watchful eye of the mother, suckling from her for approximately one year.	幼犀会在母亲的监护下，经历大约一年的哺乳期。
Their bond is an intensely strong one and the calf will remain with its mother for at least two years, benefiting from her protection. Females guard their offspring aggressively and are intimidating adversaries if challenged.	母子之间的关系极为紧密，幼犀会在母亲身边至少呆上两年，享受母亲的保护。雌犀积极地保护幼犀，如果遇到挑衅，会成为令人生畏的对手。
Incel virgin Alex Minassian told Toronto police he was part of 4chan group	“非自愿独身”处男亚历克斯·米纳西安告诉多伦多警方其是4chan团体的一员
Footage has emerged of a man alleged to have killed 10 pedestrians in Toronto telling police that he was part of an online group for sexually frustrated men.	录像显示，多伦多一名涉嫌杀害10名行人的男子告诉警方，他是性受挫在线小组的一员。
Alek Minassian, 26, said that he was part of the involuntary celibates (incel) forum on 4chan.	26岁的亚历克斯·米纳西安表示，他是4chan非自愿独身者(incel)论坛的成员。
He is now facing 10 counts of murder in Canada and 16 counts of attempted murder following the attack on April 23, 2018.	他在2018年4月23日实施袭击，现在面临加拿大10项谋杀罪和16项谋杀未遂罪。
When asked about the deaths, he told police: "I feel like I accomplished my mission."	当被问及死亡事件时，他告诉警方：“我觉得自己已经完成了使命。”
When the incident happened, it brought attention to the online world of loneliness, rage and misogyny.	事件发生后，人们开始关注网络世界的孤独、愤怒和厌女主义。
Minassian said that he had contact with a killer in California who was angry at women who had rejected him.	米纳西安说，他曾与加利福尼亚州的一名杀手接触过，这名杀手对拒绝他的女性十分愤怒。
He stands accused of driving a rental van into crowds of pedestrians in a busy north Toronto neighbourhood. Eight women and two men ranging in age from 22 to 94 died.	他被指控在多伦多北部一个繁忙的街区驾驶一辆出租货车撞向一群行人。8名女性和2名男性死亡，年龄22到94岁不等。
Minassian has yet to enter a plea. His trial begins in February, but a publication ban on his interrogation by police was lifted today. The police interview took place just hours after the attack.	米纳西安尚未进行辩护。他的审判从2月开始，但警方已于今日取消对发布其审讯内容的禁令。警方的审讯在袭击发生几小时后就开始了。
Minassian, who said he never had a girlfriend and was a virgin, acknowledged he used the van as a weapon and said he wanted to inspire more attacks.	米纳西安说，他从未有过女友，而且是处男，他承认将面包车作为武器，还表示他想引发更多的袭击事件。
He said: "I know of several other guys over the internet who feel the same way," but added that they are "too cowardly to act on their anger."	他说：“我知道网上还有其他人和我有同样的感觉，”但补充说，“他们太懦弱了，不敢在愤怒中行动。”
Minassian calls himself an "incel," short for "involuntary celibate." The incel movement is an online subculture linked to the deadly attack in Toronto as well as attacks in California and Florida. It promotes the misogynistic idea that men are entitled to have sex with women.	米纳西安自称“incel”，这是“非自愿独身者”的简称。非自愿独身者运动是一种网络亚文化，与多伦多的致命袭击事件和加利福尼亚州与佛罗里达州的袭击事件有关。他们宣扬男性有权与女性性交的厌女思想。
Over time, "incel" has become a buzzword for certain men infuriated at being rejected by women and prone to float ideas for violent payback, according to sociologists and others who study them.	据社会学家和研究这一群体的人说，随着时间推移，“非自愿独身者”已成为一种流行语，形容某些因为被女性拒绝而感到恼怒、并容易产生暴力复仇想法的男性。
Like-minded people in internet forums sometimes use "Chad" and "Stacy" as dismissive slang for men and women with more active sex lives.	在网络论坛上，持这类想法的群体有时会使用蔑视性俚语“Chad”和“Stacy”形容性生活活跃的男女。
Minassian said he discussed his sexual frustrations on the website 4chan, which has become notorious as a place for extremists to post their views.	米纳西安说，他曾在4chan网站上讨论过自己性生活受挫的问题，该网站是极端分子发表言论的臭名昭著的地方。
US theater chain bans dressing up for "Joker" screenings over fears of another shooting	美国院线恐再发枪击案，禁止在放映时打扮成“小丑”
The largest US independent theater chain won't let people in cosplay watch the critically acclaimed origin story of Batman supervillain "Joker." Face paint and masks are already banned, but safety fears still remain.	美国最大的独立院线禁止扮装者观看广受好评的蝙蝠侠超级反派“小丑”的起源故事。面部涂画和面具已被禁止，但安全隐患仍然存在。
Most US cinemas have banned masks, face paint and toy weapons after the 2012 mass shooting in Aurora, Colorado, which happened during a screening of another Batman flick, "The Dark Knight Rises." The gunman wore a Joker costume when he went on a gun and tear-gas rampage, killing 12 people and injuring 70 others. Body costumes that don't hide a person's identity, however, have been generally allowed in theaters.	在科罗拉多州奥罗拉2012年发生的大规模枪击事件后，美国绝大多数影院已禁止面具、面部涂画和玩具武器。枪击案发生时，正在播放另一部蝙蝠侠电影《蝙蝠侠：黑暗骑士崛起》。持枪者身穿小丑戏服，开枪并投放催泪瓦斯，致使12人死亡，70人受伤。不过，影院通常会允许不掩盖个人身份的扮装。
However, Landmark Theaters has now announced that it will not allow customers to wear costumes during screenings of the R-rated "Joker."	然而，Landmark影院现已宣布，播放R级影片《小丑》时观众不可穿着小丑戏服。
"I want customers to be comfortable in their surroundings," Landmark President-CEO Ted Mundorff told the Hollywood Reporter.	Landmark总裁兼首席执行官Ted Mundorff告诉《好莱坞报道》：“我希望顾客处在一个舒适的环境里。“
The company is based in Los-Angeles and runs 52 theaters in 27 markets, which makes it the biggest specialized theater chain in the country.	这家公司总部位于洛杉矶，在27个市场拥有52家影院，为美国最大的专门院线。
Meanwhile, Kansas-based AMC Theatres, the largest chain in the country, reiterated its ban on "masks, face paint or any object that conceals the face," but said they will welcome viewers in costume.	同时，全国最大院线、总部位于堪萨斯州的AMC影院重申其对“面具、面部涂画和任何面部遮挡物”的禁令，但表示他们欢迎观众进行扮装。
The ban on masks and fake guns was mostly due to practical security reasons, but as the release of "Joker" draws closer, there are concerns that it may trigger a copycat gun attack. The LAPD said it would "maintain high visibility" around theaters on premier day, while Regal Cinemas, the second-largest chain in the country, said it was implementing security protocols developed "in collaboration with NATO."	针对面具和假枪的禁令主要是出于实际安全原因，但随着《小丑》的上映时间临近，人们担心电影可能会导致有人模仿片中的枪袭。洛杉矶警察局表示，首映日他们将会在影院周围“保持警方的高可见度“，而全国第二大院线Regal影院则表示，他们正实施“与国家影院业主协会合作”制定的安全规程。
The US Army went as far as advising service members to watch out for "incels," disgruntled males who can't get a date, who supposedly idolize the Joker and may mimic his brutal ways.	美国陆军甚至建议服役人员提防“非自愿独身者”，即因无法约会而心生不满的男性。他们可能崇拜小丑，并模仿他的残忍行径。
"Joker," which is directed by Todd Phillips and stars Joaquin Phoenix as the title character, is due to be released on October 4 in the US, and is expected to become a box office hit. It follows the descent of a socially isolated and mentally unwell person, as he becomes the mass-murdering, green-haired, pale-faced nemesis of Batman.	由Todd Phillips导演、Joaquin Phoenix主演的《小丑》定档10月4日美国上映，有望票房大热。电影讲述了一个社交孤立的精神障碍患者的故事。他最后谋杀了很多人，绿发白脸，成为蝙蝠侠的头号劲敌。
It received rave reviews at its Venice International Film Festival premiere this year, taking the top prize. The film is a psychological thriller loosely based on the comic book series. Some commenters voiced concerns that it may cause harm by depicting the protagonist in a sympathetic way and including graphic and realistic violence. However, the creative team behind it said their work is meant for mature audiences who are expected to be able to tell right from wrong.	《小丑》今年在威尼斯国际电影节首映，好评如潮，同时获得了最高奖项。这部心理惊悚电影大致根据同名漫画系列改编而成。有评论家表示担忧，影片以同情的口吻描述主角，并展示写实血腥暴力，可能产生恶劣影响。但是影片幕后创意团队表示，他们的作品面向成熟观众，他们应当能够明辨是非。
Midway Broadcasting announced today that its Chairwoman, Melody Spann Cooper is set to release her highly anticipated book to help female entrepreneurs and executives thrive in business. "The Girlfriend's Guide To Closing the Deal" shares insights on how women can use their voice to achieve equity at the negotiating table and advance their careers by using the female edition of the old-boy's network.	中途广播公司今天宣布，其女董事长麦乐迪·斯潘·库伯即将推出备受期待的新书，帮助女性企业家和高管在商业上繁荣发展。《女友指南：如何达成交易》分享了女性如何利用自己的声音实现谈判桌上的公平，以及如何运用女性身份发展传统男性的社交网络，进而推动职业生涯的进步。
Throughout the book, Spann Cooper uses anecdotal references to deal with challenging issues including the #MeToo movement and Hillary Clinton's Presidential defeat and its impact on fueling the female empowerment in America.	斯潘·库伯在整本书中引用趣事来处理富有挑战性的问题，包括#MeToo运动和希拉里·克林顿总统竞选的失败，及其对推动美国女权运动的影响。
The self-published book is the result of a groundbreaking self-entitled speech that Spann Cooper delivered as a keynote address at The National Association of Women Business Owners Conference in Chicago in 2017. The Girlfriend's Guide to Closing The Deal is written in a down-to-earth style that every "girlfriend" can relate.	这本个人出版的书是斯潘·库伯在2017年芝加哥女企业家全国协会会议上，所发表的开创性主题演讲的成果。《女友指南：如何达成交易》接地气的书写风格，让每位“女友”都能感到共鸣。
Christie Hefner, businesswoman and daughter of Playboy Founder, Hugh Hefner, says "The Girlfriend's Guide to Closing The Deal" is both highly entertaining and very helpful. Melody weaves together personal anecdotes, triumphs, and setbacks with useful lessons learned. From how to own your ideas in a meeting to when its time to "friend up," everyone can benefit from Melody's story."	花花公子创始人休·海夫纳的女儿、女企业家克里斯提·海夫纳说，《女友指南：如何达成交易》有很强的娱乐性，同时很有帮助。麦乐迪将个人的趣事、胜利、挫折与有益的教训交织在一起。从如何在会议中拥有己见到“交友”的时机，每个人都能从麦乐迪的故事中受益。
As Chairman of Midway Broadcasting Corporation, she joined an elite list of America's female broadcast owners after purchasing the company's controlling interest in 1999. Midway Broadcasting Corporation is a best-in-class female and family-owned media boutique whose properties include radio and interactive platforms.	在1999年收购公司的控制股后，她作为中途广播集团董事长，加入了美国女性广播公司企业主的精英名单。中途广播集团是一流的女性和家族式精品媒体，其产业包括广播电台和交互平台。
The book was co-written with T. Shawn Taylor, journalist, writer and founder of Tree Top Consulting, a full-service media consulting firm.	本书的联合作者是T·肖恩·泰勒，记者、作家和媒体咨询全程服务公司“树顶咨询”的创始人。
Romania Invests Billions in a Black Sea Military Base	罗马尼亚在黑海军事基地斥资数十亿
Romania will spend 2.5 billion euros to modernize the Black Sea military base as part of counteracting Russia's growing presence in the region, according to The Times, quoted by the FOCUS News Agency. Mikhail Koglignichanu Airbase, located about 200 km. east of Bucharest, will be aligned with NATO standards, as evidenced by documents published by local news sites. Up to 10,000 NATO F-35 soldiers and aircraft can be accommodated there. It is planned to become a "mini-city" for the military with kindergartens, sports clubs and a hospital.	FOCUS新闻援引《泰晤士报》称，罗马尼亚将斥资25亿欧元，用于黑海军事基地的现代化，与当地渐增的俄罗斯势力相抗衡。当地新闻网站所发布的文件显示，位于布加勒斯特以东约200公里的米哈伊尔·科格尔尼恰努空军基地将达到北约标准。它将能够容纳上万北约F-35军人及战斗机，计划成为军队的“迷你城市”，包含幼儿园、运动俱乐部及一间医院。
The base has already become a center of increased NATO activity in the Black Sea, which has become a key area of tension between Russia and the West. After Moscow annexed Crimea from Ukraine in 2014, the Kremlin began to increase its naval presence in the Black Sea, using the deep-sea base in Sevastopol to carry out naval missions in Syria. Russia is also hampering shipping in the region and last year captured three Ukrainian ships in the Kerch Strait.	该基地已经成为一个活动中心，用以加强北约在黑海地区的活动，而黑海是俄罗斯与西方对峙的关键地区。2014年，莫斯科从乌克兰手里将克里米亚收入囊中之后，战列舰克里姆林开始在黑海区域增加，并利用塞瓦斯托波尔的深海基地在叙利亚执行海军任务。俄罗斯还妨碍该地区船只活动，去年在刻赤海峡扣押三艘乌克兰船只。
Romania and Bulgaria, located on the Black Sea coast, which in the past were allies of the USSR, have joined NATO and the EU since its collapse. In response to Russia's actions, they have asked the alliance to strengthen its presence in the region, writes The Times. In February, 500 US troops arrived at Romania's air base. An Eurofighter Typhoon fighter squadron of the British Air Force is stationed and deployed. Since April last year, these aircraft have repeatedly intercepted Russian fighter jets. Georgia, located on the eastern Black Sea coast, is also concerned about Russia's aspirations. It is not a member of the alliance, but is involved in NATO military exercises. NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said during a visit to Tbilisi in March that the alliance was "preparing" Georgia for accession. Ukraine has also participated in NATO exercises in the region and has been developing its engagement with the Union since 2014.	罗马尼亚和保加利亚皆毗邻黑海，过去曾为前苏联盟友。前苏联解体后，二国加入了北约和欧盟。《泰晤士报》称，为回应俄罗斯的行动，他们要求联盟加强在该地区的兵力。2月，500名美军抵达罗马尼亚空军基地。一个英国皇家空军的台风战斗机中队也驻扎在此。自去年4月以来，这些飞机多次拦截俄方战斗机。格鲁吉亚位于黑海东岸，也为俄方意图感到担忧。格鲁吉亚并非北约成员，但也参与北约的联合军事演习。北约秘书长延斯·斯托尔滕贝格3月访问格鲁吉亚时表示，北约正在为格鲁吉亚的加入“做准备”。乌克兰也参与了北约在该地区的军演。自2014以来，乌克兰加强了与北约的接触。
Ukraine, the "New Berlin Wall," Once Again Lies at the Center of Scandal	“新柏林墙”乌克兰再次成为丑闻中心
Mr. Poroshenko's eagerness to win over Mr. Trump and his growing fears that political rivals would thwart his re-election opened the way for Mr. Giuliani to press Ukraine's prosecutor general, Yuri Lutsenko, who has since been fired, to help Mr. Trump's own re-election by investigating Joe Biden and his son.	波罗申科渴望赢得特朗普的支持，并且越来越担心政治对手会阻挠他的连任，因此任由朱利安尼对乌克兰总检察长尤里·卢琴科施压，要求通过调查乔·拜登和他的儿子，来帮助特朗普连任。卢琴科已被解雇。
How Mr. Poroshenko expected the Trump administration to help lift his sagging fortunes ahead of Ukraine's presidential election, held in two rounds in March and April this year, is unclear. He got trounced anyway, losing emphatically to Mr. Zelensky, whose own officials quickly became the Trump team's new targets in its drive to damage Mr. Biden.	乌克兰总统大选于今年三月及四月分两轮进行。波罗申科希望特朗普政府如何在大选之前帮他扭转颓势，尚不明确。不管怎样，他在大选中惨败于泽连斯基。而后者的下属很快成为特朗普团队的新目标，用以帮助打击拜登。
While Democrats want Mr. Trump impeached over his dealings with Ukraine, the president and his allies have counterattacked with their own Ukraine-focused scandals. They have revived a debunked theory that the country colluded with the Clinton campaign to hurt Mr. Trump's chances in 2016 and asserted, with little evidence, that Mr. Biden used his position as vice president to prevent Ukraine from investigating his son.	民主党试图弹劾特朗普与乌克兰的交易，而总统及其盟友进行反击，指出民主党自己与乌克兰的丑闻。他们还重提了一个已经被驳斥的理论，即2016年乌克兰与克林顿竞选团队勾结，损害特朗普的竞选机会。虽缺乏证据，但他们声称拜登利用自己的副总统职权，阻止乌克兰对他的儿子进行调查。
Ukrainians, jaded after years of watching their own leaders trade the power and privileges of office for personal financial or political gain, have mostly shrugged off what, for Mr. Trump, is possibly the most serious scandal to buffet the White House since Watergate toppled President Richard Nixon in 1974.	对于国家领导用权力和特权博取个人的财政及政治利益，多年来乌克兰人早已看厌了，故对此次丑闻不屑一顾。而这一丑闻对特朗普来说，可能是理查德·尼克松因水门事件倒台以来，对白宫打击最大的一次丑闻。
That a country few Americans paid much attention to in the past now commands center stage in Washington has stirred mostly bemusement in Ukraine. Those feelings are also tinged with a touch of pride that, after centuries in the shadow of Russia, its giant neighbor to the north, the nation is no longer seen as a backwater but a pivot around which the fate of the world's most powerful country implausibly turns.	乌克兰这个国家，本来美国人几乎从不关心，如今却在华盛顿舞台中心引人瞩目。这令乌克兰忍俊不禁，而这类情绪也伴以一丝骄傲。数百年来，乌克兰一直处于北方巨大邻邦俄罗斯的阴影之下，如今已经不再被视为穷乡僻壤。虽不光彩，但它已成为世界最强国命运的枢纽。
Pavlo Klimkin, Ukraine's foreign minister under Mr. Poroshenko, said in a caustic Twitter message this week that going down in history "as the country that led to the impeachment of the U.S. president" was "not a very fun prospect." But, he added, "Now everyone understands what we are capable of."	波罗申科的外交部长巴维尔·克里姆金本周在推特上发表了尖刻的言论，表示被历史记载为“导致美国总统被弹劾的国家，并不是什么好前景”。不过他又补充道：“现在每个人都了解了我们能做什么。”
Brother Jailed For Life For Pakistan Social Media Star Qandeel Baloch's Honour Killing	巴基斯坦网红坎迪尔·俾路支被兄弟名誉谋杀一案判终身监禁
Qandeel Baloch, who shot to fame for her social media photos, was strangled in July 2016.	因社交媒体照片一炮走红的坎迪尔·俾路支（Qandeel Baloch），于2016年7月被勒颈而亡。
The brother of Pakistani social media star Qandeel Baloch was on Friday convicted of her murder and sentenced to life in prison in the patriarchal country's highest-profile "honour killing."	网红坎迪尔·俾路支的兄弟于星期五被指控谋杀并判处终身监禁。巴基斯坦父权社会背景下，“名誉谋杀”备受舆论关注。
Baloch, who shot to fame for her risque selfies -- tame by Western standards, but considered provocative in deeply misogynistic Pakistan -- was strangled in July 2016.	俾路支因其轻佻的自拍照一炮走红，以西方社会标准此本无伤大雅，但厌女主义泛滥的巴基斯坦则将其视为挑衅行为，其因此招致谋杀。
Her brother Muhammad Waseem was arrested. Days later he told a press conference that he had no remorse over what he did, saying that "of course" he had murdered his sister and that her behaviour had been "intolerable."	其兄弟穆罕默德•瓦西姆（Muhammad Waseem）已被逮捕。几日后，他在一新闻发布会上扬言，他对自己的所作所为并不感到愧疚，还表示他谋杀俾路支是“理所当然”，她的行径让人“忍无可忍”。
His lawyer, Sardar Mehmood, told AFP the court in the eastern city of Multan had found his client guilty and sentenced him to life imprisonment, in a long-awaited verdict.	其律师萨达尔·马哈茂德（Sardar Mehmood）向法新社透露，东部城市木尔坦法院在一等待已久的判决书中，认定其当事人构成犯罪并判处终身监禁。
"Inshallah (God willing), he will be acquitted by a high court," he said.	“凭安拉的旨意，他会被高级法庭赦免，”他表示。
Earlier, Baloch's mother Anwar Mai told AFP she had hoped her son would be acquitted.	早些时候，俾路支母亲安瓦尔·梅（Anwar Mai）告诉法新社，她希望自己的儿子能被赦免。
"He is innocent. She was my daughter and he is my son," she said.	“他是无辜的。一个是我的女儿，另一个是我的儿子，”她说道。
Baloch's murder made international headlines and reignited calls for action against an epidemic of so-called "honour killings," in which a victim -- usually a woman -- is murdered for flouting patriarchal social codes.	所谓“名誉谋杀”，是指受害者——通常为女性——因公然挑衅父权社会法规而被谋杀。俾路支谋杀案不仅成为国际舆论的热点，也再次激起抵制此病态现象的呼声。
Women have been burned, shot, stabbed and strangled for offences such as choosing their own husband or -- in Baloch's case -- bringing "shame" on their family by celebrating their sexuality.	不少女性的冒犯行为，如自己选择丈夫，又或如俾路支就因为炫耀性感而让其家人“蒙羞”，让她们或被活活烧死，或被枪杀，或被刺死，或被勒颈而亡。
The killings are usually carried out by a close relative. Under Pakistan's Qisas (blood money) and Diyat (retribution) law, they can then seek forgiveness from a victim's relatives.	凶手常为近亲。根据巴基斯坦Qisas（意指血债）和Diyat（意指复仇）法律，凶犯可以博得受害者亲属的原谅。
Three months after Baloch's murder, parliament passed new legislation mandating life imprisonment for honour killings.	俾路支谋杀案三个月后，巴基斯坦国会通过新法，强制要求对荣誉谋杀判处终身监禁。
However, whether a murder is defined as a crime of honour is left to the judge's discretion, meaning that killers can theoretically claim a different motive and still be pardoned.	然而，谋杀犯是否构成荣誉谋杀罪名，仍需法官的判定，即凶犯理论上可以宣称另一种动机而且还被赦免。
In Baloch's case, her parents initially insisted their son would be given no absolution.	俾路支谋杀案中，其父母最初坚持罪犯不应被赦免。
But, heartbroken at the thought of losing him also, they changed their minds and said they wanted him to be forgiven.	但一想到又要失去儿子，伤心欲绝的他们变得心软，希望赦免罪犯。
International revulsion at the killing had seen the Pakistani state take the unprecedented step of declaring itself an heir alongside the parents, however, forcing the case to move ahead.	面对国际社会对谋杀罪的排斥态度，巴基斯坦采取了前所未有的行动，称自己是凶手父母的孩子，但又要求继续审理该案。
Some of Baloch's better-known actions included offering to perform a striptease for the Pakistani cricket team, and donning a plunging scarlet dress on Valentine's Day.	俾路支某些更广为人知的行为包括为巴基斯坦板球队表演脱衣舞，情人节穿着猩红色低领裙。
She attracted criticism and threats but was perceived by many, including young people, as breaking new ground in a country where presenting yourself as a Kim Kardashian-like figure can be seen as a bold, political act of women's empowerment.	在巴基斯坦，如果你将自己变成金·卡戴珊式（Kim Kardashian）的人物，社会将视其为公然支持女权的政治行为。尽管俾路支饱受批评并招致人身危险，但不少人包括年轻人视其为对这个国家桎梏的大胆突破。
The roots of "honour" killings lie in tribal social norms, which remain prevalent across South Asia and dictate the behaviour of women in particular, though men can be victims too.	“荣誉谋杀”根源是南亚地区普遍存在的部落社会准则，具体上表现为对女性行为的支配。当然，男性中也不乏有“荣誉谋杀”的受害者。
Three Scottish students named among Europe's best	三名苏格兰学生入选欧洲顶尖学生名单
Three University of Dundee students have been named regional winners as top graduates in Europe.	邓迪大学的三名学生被提名为欧洲顶尖毕业生的地区优胜者。
The University of Dundee students were named as top graduates in their respective fields in Europe in the 2019 Global Undergraduate Awards, whilst five other students from the same university were praised by the judges.	邓迪大学的学生在2019全球本科生奖项中被提名为各自领域的顶尖毕业生，同时同校的另外5名学生也受到了评委的称赞。
Scott Sheldrick, who graduated in Molecular Genetics, won the Europe award for Life Sciences, Chester Cornford studied MSc Mental Health Nursing and was awarded the Nursing, Midwifery & Allied Healthcare prize, whilst Lola Knibb won the Visual Arts award.	毕业于分子遗传学专业的斯科特·谢德里克获得了欧洲生命科学奖，攻读心理健康护理硕士的切斯特·科福德获得了欧洲护理、助产和联合医疗奖，而罗拉·科尼布获得了欧洲视觉艺术奖。
Although all three made it through to the global final, they lost out in the final round to strong competition from some of the 3,500 entrants from across the world.	虽然三人都进入了全球总选阶段，但在最后一轮比赛中，他们在来自世界各地的3500名参赛者的强烈竞争中败下阵来。
Professor Blair Grubb, Vice-Principal (Education) at the University, said: "To get to this stage, our students and graduates faced competition from peers attending some of the world's top universities.	邓迪大学（教育）副校长布莱尔·格拉布教授说：“为了达到这个阶段，我们的学生和毕业生面临着来自全球各地顶尖高校的竞争。”
"The Undergraduate Awards are fiercely contested by thousands of students around the world and it is a great reflection of the quality of our students, and the education they receive here, that Dundee is so strongly represented amongst the prize winners.	“本科生奖由世界各地成千上万的学生激烈角逐，邓迪大学在获奖学生中具有如此强大的代表性，这充分反映了我们学生的质量，以及他们在这里接受的教育质量。
"I would like to offer my warmest congratulations to Scott, Chester and Lola on this fantastic achievement, alongside the other Dundee representatives who were highly commended."	“我要向斯科特、切斯特和罗拉表示最热烈的祝贺，祝贺他们取得了这一了不起的成就，同时也祝贺其他受到高度赞扬的邓迪大学代表。”
Another five students were commended in the world's leading undergraduate awards programme, which recognises top work completed by undergraduates to share this with a global audience.	另有五名学生在全球顶尖本科生奖项中获得表彰，该计划旨在表彰本科生的杰出表现，并与全球观众分享。
Included in the five praised students were Nicholas Gallagher and James Osbourne (both Life Sciences), Ferenc Kohsuke Ishikawa Gutai (Medicine), Caitlyn Scott (Anatomical Sciences) and Waco Yokoyama (Philosophy).	受到表彰的五名学生为括尼古拉斯·加拉格尔和詹姆斯·奥斯本（均为生命科学）、费伦茨·石川古泰（医学）、凯特林·斯科特（解剖学）和瓦科·横山（哲学）。
The competition further celebrates top undergraduate coursework and helps create collaborations between students and recent graduates worldwide.	比赛进一步表彰了顶尖本科生的课业，并有助于创造全球学生和毕业生之间的合作。
Oldest galaxy protocluster forms 'queen's court'	最古老星系原星团堪称“女王宫廷”
Using the Subaru, Keck, and Gemini Telescopes, an international team of astronomers has discovered a collection of 12 galaxies which existed about 13.0 billion years ago. This is the earliest protocluster ever found. One of the 12 galaxies is a giant object, known as Himiko, which was discovered a decade ago by the Subaru Telescope and named for a mythological queen in ancient Japan. This discovery suggests that large structures such as protoclusters already existed when the Universe was only about 800 million years old, 6 percent of its present age.	凭借昴星团、凯克、双子三大望远镜，一国际天文学家团队发现由12个星系组成的星系团。其已存在约130亿年，是目前为止已知最为古老的原星团。名为卑弥呼（Himiko）的十二星系之一极为巨大，由昴星团天文望远镜于十年前发现，并以古代日本极具神秘色彩的女王名字命名。该发现说明，宇宙诞生8亿年之时（当前历史的6%），诸如原星团之类的大尺度结构就已存在。
In the present Universe, galaxy clusters can contain hundreds of members, but how these clusters form is a big question in astronomy. To understand the formation of clusters, astronomers search for possible progenitors in the ancient Universe. A protocluster is a dense system of dozens of galaxies in the early Universe, growing into a cluster.	目前，宇宙中的星系团能包含数百个星系，但天文学上星系团的形成机制还不得而知。为理解星系团的形成机制，天文学家于古老的宇宙中探寻其可能的祖先。原星团是早期宇宙中一含有数十个星系的致密体系，最终会演化成星团。
Yuichi Harikane, a JSPS fellow at the National Astronomical Observatory of Japan who led the team of astronomers explains, "A protocluster is a rare and special system with an extremely high density, and not easy to find. To overcome this problem, we used the wide field of view of the Subaru Telescope to map a large area of the sky and look for protoclusters."	羽根裕一（Yuichi Harikane），其是日本学术振兴会（JSPS）在日本国立天文台（National Astronomical Observatory of Japan）的成员，也有领导该天文学家团队，他解释道，“原星团是一罕见而又特别的体系，密度极高，而且不易被发现。为攻克此问题，我们使用昴星团天文望远镜的广角视野绘制一大片天空区域的天图以搜寻原星团。”
In the map of the Universe made by the Subaru Telescope, the team discovered a protocluster candidate, z66OD, where galaxies are 15 times more concentrated than normal for that era. The team then conducted follow-up spectroscopic observations using the W.M. Keck Observatory and Gemini North telescope, and confirmed 12 galaxies which existed 13.0 billion years ago, making it the earliest protocluster known to date.	在以昴星团天文望远镜绘制的天图上，该团队发现一候选原星团z66OD，在此处，星系密度是同时期正常区域的15倍。该团队随后以凯克天文台天文望远镜和北双子天文望远镜开展光谱观察，确认12个有130亿年历史的星系，此为目前为止已知最为古老的原星团。
Interestingly, one of the 12 galaxies in z66OD was a giant object with a huge body of gas, known as Himiko, which was found previously by the Subaru Telescope in 2009. "It is reasonable to find a protocluster near a massive object, such as Himiko. However, we're surprised to see that Himiko was located not in the center of the protocluster, but on the edge 500 million light-years away from the center." said Masami Ouchi, a team member at the National Astronomical Observatory of Japan and the University of Tokyo, who discovered Himiko in 2009. Ironically, the mythological queen Himiko is also said to have lived cloistered away from her people. Ouchi continues, "It is still not understood why Himiko is not located in the center. These results will be a key for understanding the relationship between clusters and massive galaxies."	有一点很有趣，z66OD十二星系之一为一带有巨型气态主体的庞大物体，名为卑弥呼，之前于2009年为昴星团天文望远镜所发现。“庞大物体周围发现如卑弥呼之类的原星团，合情合理。然而，我们对卑弥呼没有位于原星团中心而是位于离中心有5亿光年的边缘地区感到惊讶。”大内正美（Masami Ouchi）表示，其是该团队在日本国立天文台和东京大学的成员，于2009年发现卑弥呼。有一点很诡异，极具神秘色彩的卑弥呼据说好幽居，不愿见其子民。正美继续说道，“卑弥呼为何不在中心，还不得而知。上述发现将成为理解星团和巨星系之间关系的关键。”
Nancy Pelosi is subject of book by daughter Christine Pelosi	南希·佩洛西成为女儿克莉丝汀·佩洛西的书写对象
An upcoming book on House Speaker Nancy Pelosi comes from someone who knows her well, daughter Christine Pelosi.	一本关于美众议院议长南希·佩洛西的书即将出版，作者是一位知之甚深的人——她的女儿克莉丝汀·佩洛西。
"The Nancy Pelosi Way" will be released Nov. 26, Skyhorse Publishing announced Thursday. Christine Pelosi's book will examine how a mother of five became the first female house speaker and her current leadership of House Democrats during the Trump administration. According to Skyhorse, Christine Pelosi will weave together "the professional and personal experiences" of her mother.	周四，天马出版公司宣布，《南希·佩洛西之道》将于11月26日发行。克莉丝汀·佩洛西的这本书将探讨一位拥有五个孩子的母亲是如何成为第一位女性美国众议院议长，以及她当前如何在特朗普执政期领导众议院民主党。天马公司称，克莉丝汀·佩洛西的讲述，会将母亲的“专业及个人经验”交织在一起。
Christine Pelosi is a Democratic Party strategist and author of "Campaign Boot Camp" and "Campaign Boot Camp 2.0." Pelosi's sister, Alexandra Pelosi, is a filmmaker and journalist who has made several documentaries about contemporary politics.	克莉丝汀·佩洛西是民主党策略师，著有《竞选训练营》、《竞选训练营2.0》。佩洛西的妹妹亚历山德拉·佩洛西是一名电影制作人及记者，曾制作多部当代政治纪录片。
Warren's lemonade money went to a pro-life charity	沃伦买柠檬水的钱流入反堕胎慈善事业
When Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D., Mass.) purchased drinks from two girls running a lemonade stand in August, she may not have been aware that her $10 purchase would be donated to a pro-life charity.	当参议院伊丽莎白·沃伦（马萨诸塞州民主党人）8月在两个女孩摆的柠檬水小摊上购买饮料时，她可能不知道自己花费的10美元将捐献给一个反堕胎慈善机构。
"Our daughters thought [Warren] was nice," Dan Michels, a Trump supporter and a father to one of the girls, told the Washington Free Beacon. "She came by and told us we should vote for her. And our daughters told us she was a nice person, but we don't align with her politically and ... because she's pro-choice, we said we should donate her money to a pro-life [cause]."	“我们的女儿觉得（沃伦）人不错。”丹·米歇尔斯告诉《华盛顿自由灯塔》，他是特朗普的支持者，其中一个女孩的父亲。“她走过来说，我们应该给她投票。女儿们说她是个不错的人，但我们不认同她的政治观点……因为她提倡堕胎合法，我们说，我们应该把她的钱捐给反堕胎的慈善（事业）。”
On August 8, Warren stopped by a lemonade stand staffed by two 11-year-old children, Sienna Michels and Audrey Billings, during a campaign bus tour across Iowa.	8月8日，沃伦在爱荷华州的竞选巴士巡游中，在两个11岁的儿童西耶娜·米歇尔斯和奥德莉·比林斯摆的柠檬水小摊旁边停下了。
"Stopped for a quick drink at a lemonade stand in Harlan, Iowa. When life gives you lemons, make big structural change!" Warren said on Twitter.	“停下来在爱荷华哈兰的柠檬水小摊快速地喝了一杯。当生活给你柠檬，你要做出结构性改变！”沃伦在推特上说。
The two kids were excited about meeting a presidential candidate in person. The Michels girl urged her parents to vote for the Massachusetts senator in 2020 after the photo op. The parents instead explained Warren's stance on abortion. The girls and their parents decided to donate to the March for Life Education and Defense Fund, a non-profit that supports pro-life legislation.	两个孩子很兴奋能亲自见到一位总统候选人。米歇尔斯家的女儿在合影后要求父母在2020年投票给这位马萨诸塞州的参议员。她们的父母反而解释了沃伦对待堕胎的立场。女孩们和父母决定捐款给“生命教育与保护基金会”，这是一个支持反堕胎条款的非营利性组织。
"My daughter told us she wanted us to vote for her," Michels said. "We talked about the abortion part of things and said maybe we should donate money to stop abortion, and my daughter was all for that."	“我的女儿说，她想让我们给她投票，”米歇尔斯说。“我们谈论了堕胎的事，还说也许我们应该捐钱来阻止堕胎行为，我的女儿完全支持。”
Why viruses like Herpes and Zika will need to be reclassified: Biotech impact	为什么需要重新分类疱疹和寨卡之类的病毒：生物科技的作用
New research reveals that the way viruses were perceived in terms of their architecture will need to be retooled, because they are actually structured in many more patterns than previously understood. The findings could have significant impact on how they are classified, our understanding of how they form, evolve and infect hosts, and strategies to identify ways to design vaccines to target them.	最近的研究表明，需要更新以结构认识病毒的方法，因为病毒结构的形成模式事实上远多出于已知类型。此发现可能会极大影响到病毒该如何分类，还有我们对其形成、进化和感染宿主的认识以及如何设法开发以其为靶点的疫苗。
In the 1950s and '60s as scientists began to obtain high resolution images of viruses, they discovered the detailed structure of the capsid -- an outer protective layer composed of multiple copies of the same protein -- which protects the virus' genetic material. The majority of viruses have capsids that are typically quasi-spherical and display icosahedral symmetry -- like a 20-sided dice for instance.	上世纪50至60年代，科学家开始获得病毒的高清图像，同时有发现衣壳的精细结构。衣壳是由多重相同蛋白组成的外周保护层，可以保护病毒的遗传物质。大多病毒拥有衣壳——常为类球状且展示出二十面体对称，就如20面骰子。
The capsid shell is what protects them, and as scientists discovered their structure, they proposed that capsids could have different sizes and hold different amounts of genome, and therefore could infect hosts differently.	衣壳就是其保护伞。科学家发现其结构时，认为衣壳大小可能不同而且所含基因组数量不同，以至于感染宿主的程度也有所不同。
Why this matters	为何重要
When designing drugs to target viruses, scientists can now take their varying structural shapes into account to improve efficacy.	现在，科学家为靶向病毒开发药物时，可以考虑病毒不同的结构形态以提高药效。
Two researchers who study the structures of viruses, Antoni Luque, a theoretical biophysicist at San Diego State University and a member of its Viral Information Institute, and Reidun Twarock, a mathematical biologist from the University of York, UK, and a member of York's Cross-disciplinary Centre for Systems Analysis, show that many viruses have essentially been misclassified for 60 years, including common viruses such as Herpes simplex and Zika.	两名探究病毒结构的研究者——安东尼·卢克（Antoni Luque），圣地亚哥州立大学理论生物物理学家，同时为该校病毒信息研究所研究员，另一名研究者雷敦·特瓦洛克（Reidun Twarock）为英国约克大学数学生物学家，同时为约克跨学科系统分析中心研究员——二人表示，60年来，许多病毒本质上遭错误分类，包括常见的单纯疱疹病毒、寨卡病毒。
This was because despite having the structural images from cryo-electron microscopy, we did not have the mathematical description of many of the architectures of different viruses.	个中原因就是，我们虽然能以冷冻电镜获取病毒的结构图像，但并不能给出各种病毒不同结构的数学化描述。
"We discovered six new ways in which proteins can organize to form icosahedral capsid shells," Luque said. "So, many viruses don't adopt only the two broadly understood capsid architectures. There are now at least eight ways in which their icosahedral capsids could be designed."	“我们已发现蛋白质以六种全新方式组织形成二十面体衣壳，”卢克表示。“由此可见，许多病毒不止采用两种已深入研究的衣壳结构。至少有八种方法使其能设计自身的二十面体衣壳。”
They used a generalization of the quasiequivalence principle to see how proteins can wrap around an icosahedral capsid.	两人以一般化准等效原则探究蛋白质包裹于二十面体衣壳表面的方法。
Their study, which will be published in Nature Communications on Friday, September 27, also shows that viruses that are part of the same structural lineage, based on the protein that they're composed of, adopt consistent icosahedral capsid layouts, providing a new approach to study virus evolution.	其研究将于9月27日星期五发表于《自然-通讯》杂志（Nature Communications）。该研究揭示，根据构成病毒的蛋白，属同一结构谱系病毒会采取一致的二十面体衣壳排布，此为研究病毒进化提供新方法。
Biotech applications	生物科技应用
Structural biologists can now take this information and reclassify the structure of the viruses, which will help unveil molecular and evolutionary relationships between different viruses.	结构生物学家现可利用此信息重新分类病毒结构，此将有助于揭示不同病毒间的分子和进化关系。
It will also provide a guide to engineer new molecular containers for nanotech and biotech applications, and it will help scientists to identify specific strategies to target the assembly of proteins in the capsid. This can eventually lead to a more systematic approach to developing antiviral vaccines.	同时，此将为纳米科技和生物科技应用提供开发新型工程化分子容器的思路，并且有助于科学家确定具体方法对准衣壳中的蛋白组装，最终为开发抗病毒疫苗确定更为系统化的方法。
"We can use this discovery to target both the assembly and stability of the capsid, to either prevent the formation of the virus when it infects the host cell, or break it apart after it's formed," Luque said. "This could facilitate the characterization and identification of antiviral targets for viruses sharing the same icosahedral layout."	“根据该研究，我们将衣壳稳定性和组装作为靶点，以阻止宿主被感染时病毒的形成，或者使形成的病毒破裂。”卢克表示。“此可能推进拥有相同二十面体排布病毒的抗病毒靶点表征与鉴别研究。”
This new framework accommodates viruses that were previously outliers, provides new predictions of viral capsid architectures, and has identified common geometrical patterns among distant evolutionary related viruses that infect everyone from humans to bacteria.	此全新体系含有原本不在此内的病毒，也对病毒衣壳结构做出新预测，并且在从人类到细菌无所不感染且有进化距离关系的病毒中确定出常见的几何构造模式。
Twarock said the new blueprints also provide "a new perspective on viral evolution, suggesting novel routes in which larger and more complex viruses may have evolved from simple ones at evolutionary timescales."	特瓦洛克表示，此全新蓝图也有给出“病毒进化的全新视角，阐明进化时间尺度之下病毒可能从简单态进化到更大更复杂态的新途径。”
Architectural applications	建筑学应用
The geometries could be also used in new architectural designs in buildings and construction.	建筑施工中新型建筑的设计也有采用该几何体系。
Since the 1960s, these viral capsids have been classified using the geometrical framework introduced by structural biologist Donald Caspar and biophysicist Aaron Klug, which were inspired by the geodesic domes designed by the renowned architect R. Buckminster Fuller. However, as molecular imaging techniques have advanced, an increasing number of 3D viral capsid reconstructions that included viruses like Herpes or Zika have fallen out from this classical geometrical framework.	结构生物学家唐纳德·卡斯珀（Donald Caspar）和生物物理学家阿龙·克卢格（Aaron Klug）曾受到著名建筑学家理查德·巴克敏斯特·富勒（R. Buckminster Fuller）所设计的曲面几何穹顶启发，上世纪60年代以来，两人引进的几何体系被用以分类上述病毒衣壳。然而，随着分子成像技术的进步，此经典几何体系不再适用于许多日益增加的病毒衣壳3D重建图像，其中就包括诸如疱疹和寨卡之类的病毒。
"This study introduces a more general framework than the classic Caspar-Klug construction. It is based on the conservation of the local vertices formed by the proteins that interact in the capsid," Luque explained. "This approach led to the discovery of six new types of icosahedral capsid layouts, while recovering the two classical layouts from Caspar-Klug based on Goldberg and geodesic polyhedra."	“此研究有引进一个相比于卡斯珀-克卢格构造更为一般的体系。其根据是与衣壳相互作用蛋白质所形成局部顶点的守恒，”卢克解释道。“此方法使得六种新型二十面体衣壳排布被发现，同时根据戈德堡多面体以及曲面几何多面体重建出卡斯珀-克卢格构造中的两个经典排布”。
Priest who sexually abused boys in Wisconsin gets 30 years	威斯康辛神父性虐男童判30年
A former priest accused of sexually assaulting young boys in Wisconsin decades ago has been sentenced to 30 years in prison.	威斯康辛一名前神父曾于数十年前涉嫌对男童实施性虐特，已被判入狱30年。
The Wausau Daily Herald reports that 72-year-old Thomas Ericksen received the maximum sentence Thursday on two charges of sexually assaulting young boys while stationed at St. Peter's Catholic Church in Winter in the late 70s and early 80s. He must register as a sex offender for life.	当地日报Wausau Daily Herald报道，周四，现年72岁的托马斯·埃里克森面临两项指控，即于70年代末及80年代初，在任职温特圣彼得天主教堂期间对男童实施性虐特。他因此受到最高惩处，必须终身登记为性侵者。
Four men testified Thursday about how the assaults affected their lives. One of the victims went public for the first time.	周四，四人提供证词，表明性侵行为如何影响了他们的生活。其中一位受害者是第一次公开身份。
Ericksen apologized to the victims in court and said he has come to realize the impact the assaults had on victims. At least 11 men claim they were abused by Ericksen during his time in the clergy.	埃里克森向受害人道歉，并表示他已经意识到自己的性侵行为对受害者产生的影响。至少11人称曾在埃里克森任职期间被侵犯。
Ericksen was removed from the priesthood in 1988.	1988年，埃里克森被解除神职。
Having Too Much Of This Spice Could Damage Liver	过多摄入此香料可能会导致肝脏损伤
Made from the inner bark of the Cinnamomum tree, cinnamon is a widely popular spice, earning itself a place in a large variety of food and even becoming a flavor itself.	肉桂由肉桂树的内皮制作而成，是一种广受欢迎的香料，被添加在多种食物中，甚至本身就成为了一种口味。
And all for good reason since the spice is host to some very impressive health benefits, such as lowering the risk of life-threatening diseases like heart disease, cancer and even diabetes.	这种香料对人体健康有非常大的好处，例如可以降低患心脏病、癌症甚至糖尿病等致命疾病的风险，因此受欢迎也是理所当然的。
But hold your horses just yet since too much of a good thing can be harmful, very harmful. And in this case, here are some side effects one can get if they eat too much cinnamon. Stay safe out there.	然而，再好的东西吃多了也会有害处，甚至有很大的害处。同样的，如果肉桂吃得过多，就会有以下一些副作用，因此还需谨慎食用。
May increase the risk of cancer - Unfortunately, while cinnamon can help lower the risk of cancer, it can also very much contribute to the development of it. Per animal studies, consuming too much coumarin, which is commonly found in Cassia cinnamon, may increase the risk of cancer development. Per scientists, coumarin does this by supposedly damaging our DNAs over time.	可能增加癌症风险。食用肉桂可以帮助降低患癌的风险，然而同时也可能会极大地促成此病的发展。据动物研究显示，常见于决明属肉桂中的香豆素如摄入过量，可能会增加癌症发展的风险。有科学家推测，香豆素会逐渐导致DNA损伤，以至癌变风险增加。
May cause liver damage - Per studies, too much coumarin can also be responsible for liver toxicity and damage. This is according to several studies made on the effects of too much coumarin in our bodies.	可能造成肝脏损伤。基于几项关于过量香豆素对人体影响的研究，摄入过量香豆素也可能导致肝中毒和损伤。
May cause mouth sores - Not only does too much cinnamon help contribute to deadly conditions but they may also cause mouth sores. This is supposedly because cinnamon contains cinnamaldehyde, which is a compound that when ingested in large amounts, can cause an allergic reaction in our bodies. However, one can only get mouth sores from cinnamaldehyde when they're allergic from it.	可能引起口腔溃疡。过量食用肉桂不仅会引发致命疾病，也可能会引起口腔溃疡。据推测是因为肉桂含有一种名为肉桂醛的混合物，而大量摄入这种混合物，会引起人体的过敏反应。不过，只有那些对肉桂醛有过敏反应的人才会因此患上口腔溃疡。
May cause breathing problems - This is more of a general precaution since cinnamon's fine texture makes it very easy to inhale that may cause coughing and gagging as well as the cinnamaldehyde in it acting as a throat irritant.	可能导致呼吸问题。可以预见肉桂的小颗粒结构很容易被吸入体内，其中的肉桂醛会对咽喉起到刺激作用，从而引发咳嗽和呕吐。
May cause low blood sugar - For many people, cinnamon is helpful since it's well known for having the ability to lower our blood sugar. This is good, especially for those who suffer from high blood sugar. However, too many of it can make our blood sugar fall too low, posing a new set of health risks.	可能造成低血糖。肉桂以降低血糖的功能被人熟知，因此对许多人，尤其是高血糖患者有帮助。然而，过多摄入会让我们的血糖降得过低，而构成新的健康隐忧。
Tennessee's abortion waiting period trial goes to judge	田纳西州堕胎等待期由法官定夺
A federal judge will have to decide which experts to believe in a trial over Tennessee's 48-hour waiting period law for abortions.	在关于48小时堕胎等待期的一次审判中，联邦法官需要决定，应当相信哪些专家。
Over the course of a four-day trial in Nashville that concluded Thursday, the state tried to show that the law, which requires women to make two separate trips to a clinic at least 48 hours apart, benefits women by allowing them time to reflect on their decisions. Attorneys representing five of the state's seven abortion clinics argued the law provides no benefits and causes significant burdens.	纳什维尔州周四结束的一次审判，已持续四天。在此期间，该州试图表明法律规定女性必须两次前往诊所，期间至少相隔48小时。这一规定使女性有时间对自己的决定进行反思，因此对她们有益。代表该州七家堕胎诊所中五家诊所的律师称，这一法规没有任何益处，反而造成了巨大负担。
Experts for both sides agreed that some women seeking abortions are uncertain, and some women who go through with an abortion later regret their decision. But they differed on whether those constituted a large or small percentage of the women seeking abortions. The experts also disagreed on whether Tennessee's 48-hour waiting period would make any difference for those women.	双方专家同意，试图堕胎的一些女性并不坚定，一些女性堕完胎表示后悔。但这类女性是否占多数，以及田纳西州规定的48小时等待期对她们到底有没有意义，双方专家持不同意见。
On Thursday, attorneys for the state introduced a study from Utah on the effects of a 72-hour waiting period there. It found that 8% of participating women who attended an initial counselling visit later said they were no longer seeking an abortion.	周四，州律师介绍了犹他州的一项研究，其论题为犹他州72小时等待期的影响。研究发现，前去进行初次咨询的女性中，有8%后来选择了不进行堕胎。
Questioned about the study, Antonia Biggs, a social psychologist researcher at the University of California San Francisco, agreed that some women change their minds about having an abortion or are uncertain to begin with. But she noted that the study did not find that Utah's mandatory waiting period caused women to change their minds or that it was otherwise beneficial to women.	加利福尼亚大学旧金山分校社会心理学家安东尼娅·比格斯对该研究提出质疑。她同意，有些女性改变主意，有些一开始就不确定。但她也指出，该研究并未表明犹他州强制等待期令女性改变决定，或是此规定对女性有益。
Biggs also testified that there is no evidence that abortion causes women to have mental health problems. She said a national study comparing women seeking abortions who were just under the cutoff date to obtain them with a group of women who were over the cutoff and were turned away from clinics found no difference in the rates of issues like depression and post-traumatic stress.	比格斯也证明，没有证据表明堕胎会导致女性的心理健康问题。她说，一项全国性研究比较了在即将超过最晚堕胎时间选择堕胎的女性和因超过最晚堕胎时间而被诊所拒绝的女性，两个群体发生抑郁症及创伤后压力等问题的概率没有差异。
Under cross-examination Biggs said the study did not follow the mental health outcomes of women in states with waiting periods who changed their minds about having an abortion, although there were only three women like that identified in the study. She rebutted testimony from earlier in the week by Priscilla Coleman, a psychology professor at Bowling Green State University in Ohio, who said that abortion is associated with mental health problems.	继续追问之下，比格斯表示，对于州法规定了等待期并且决定不堕胎的女性，该研究并没对她们的心理健康状况进行跟踪观察，尽管研究中这类女性只有三名。比格斯还反驳了俄亥俄州鲍林格林州立大学心理学教授普里西拉·科尔曼提供的证词。几天前，科尔曼称堕胎与心理健康状况有关。
Coleman testified that she believes most of the scientific literature on abortion is politically biased in favor of abortions.	科尔曼还表明，她认为大多关于堕胎的科学文献都有政治偏见，倾向堕胎。
Thursday also included testimony for the state from a Memphis obstetrician and gynecologist who participates in a controversial network that attempts to halt the effects of abortion-inducing medication. Dr. Michael Podraza said that through that work he has "personal experience with women who have changed their minds about an abortion."	周四还有一位孟菲斯妇产科医生提供的证词，他参与一个颇有争议的圈子，试图停止包括用药等堕胎后果。迈克尔·波德拉察医生说，他因此“与改变堕胎决定的女性有个人经验”。
Tennessee's waiting period law went into effect in mid-2015, and Podraza said he has seen several women since then who wanted to try to reverse a medical abortion that was already underway. Some of those women then changed their minds a second time and followed through with the abortion, he testified. These reversals happened in spite of the waiting period.	田纳西州的等待期法律自2015年中生效。波德拉察说，自那以后，他见过数名女性在药物流产过程中反悔。他也证实，其中一些女性又再次改变主意，决定继续完成堕胎。尽管有等待期，还是发生了这些反悔现象。
Clinic directors previously testified the wait period causes women financial hardship and stress. They also said the two-visit requirement poses logistical challenges for patients and clinics that cause abortions to be delayed far beyond the 48 hours required by law, pushing some women into surgical abortions, which have greater risks of complications. A few women are pushed beyond the time when they can receive an abortion altogether.	诊所所长曾提供证词，表示等待期导致女性的经济困难及压力。他还表示，两次就诊的规定，给病人及医生都造成后勤困难，使堕胎延迟超过法律规定的48小时，迫使一些女性进行并发症风险更大的手术流产。少数女性更被拖至堕胎期限之后，根本无法进行流产。
Tennessee is one of 14 states with laws requiring women to make two trips to an abortion clinic according to the Guttmacher Institute, a research group that supports abortion rights.	根据支持堕胎权的古特马赫研究所，田纳州是立法规定两次就诊的14个州之一。
In determining whether Tennessee's waiting period violates the U.S. Constitution, U.S. District Judge Bernard Freidman must determine whether it places an undue burden on women seeking abortion. It's a subjective standard that has caused some waiting period laws to be struck down and others upheld, depending on the specific circumstances of the state.	要确定田纳西州等待期是否违反美国宪法，美国地方法官伯纳德·弗里德曼必须先确定这一法律是否给寻求堕胎的女性造成过大负担。因各州情况不同，这一主观标准，曾使数项等待期法律废除，却也支持了另一些等待期法律。
After both sides rested their cases on Thursday, Friedman said he would rule as quickly as possible.	周四双方停止辩论之后，弗里德曼表示他将尽快做出裁决。
French chemical fire extinguished as questions mount	法国化学火灾熄灭 问题重重
French authorities and Normandy residents are clearing up residue from a huge fire at a chemical plant as a foul stench continues to spread over a swath of territory.	法国当局及诺曼底居民正在清理一家化工厂大火之后的残留物，恶臭仍持续外泄，影响大片地区。
No one was injured in Thursday's fire at a lubricant plant in Rouen, but residents have expressed concern about possible health risks and consequences for the nearby Seine River.	周四的鲁昴润滑剂工厂火灾中无人受伤，但居民表示担忧，认为存在健康隐患，附近的塞纳河也将受影响。
The head of the regional administration said Friday the fire was extinguished Thursday night after nearly 24 hours. Firefighters are still on the scene.	地区行政首脑周五表示，将近24小时之后，大火已于周四晚间扑灭。消防人员仍在现场。
The administration warned of a new odor released after the fire was put out, saying it could spread to neighboring regions.	行政部门警告，灭火之后会有新的气味流散，可能波及邻近区域。
Interior Minister Christophe Castaner said people in fragile health should remain indoors through Friday night.	内政部长克里斯托夫·卡斯塔纳表示，健康状况不良者应留在室内，直至周五晚过后。
The cause of the fire is being investigated. The plant is among the highest-risk industrial sites in Europe.	火灾起因仍在调查中。该工厂为欧洲风险最高的工业场地之一。
LNG investments hit record in 2019 & the biggest growth is coming from China	液化天然气投资2019创历史新高，最大增长来自中国
Investments in liquefied natural gas since the start of the year have hit an all-time high of $50 billion, the International Energy Agency's head, Fatih Birol, told an industry conference.	国际能源署负责人Fatih Birol在一次产业会议上透露，液化天然气方向自今年年初以来的投资已创历史新高，达500亿美元。
"This year, 2019 already broke the highest amount of (final investment decisions) for the first time ever, $50 billion," Birol told the LNG Producer-Consumer conference in Tokyo, as quoted by Reuters.	路透社报道，Birol在东京举行的液化天然气生产者消费者会议上透露：“今年，即2019年，首次打破了（最终投资决定）总金额最高纪录，达到500亿美元。”
Unsurprisingly, the driver of this growth in investments is growing demand for the fuel in Asia, with China still expected to overtake Japan as the world's top importer of LNG.	不出所料，投资增长的最大驱动力来自亚洲不断增长的燃料需求。仍有预计表示，中国将取代日本，成为全球最大液化天然气进口国。
"The biggest growth is coming from China. In the next five years, about one-third of global LNG demand will come from China alone," Birol said. He added that in five years, China will become the largest importer of the fuel.	Birol说：“最大的增长来自中国。在未来五年内，全球大约三分之一的液化天然气需求会来自中国这一个国家。”他补充道，中国会在五年内成为全球最大燃料进口国。
As for the growth in investments, there are no surprises there, either. The bulk of these has been made in the United States and Canada.	投资有所增长，也不足为奇。其中大部分资金投入了美国和加拿大。
In a December 2018 report the Energy Information Administration said it expected the United States" LNG export capacity to double by the end of this year to 8.9 billion cu ft daily. This will make the US the third-largest exporter of LNG in terms of capacity after Qatar and Australia. By 2030, US LNG exports are estimated to reach 17 billion cu ft daily, from some 3 billion cu ft at the start of 2019.	能源信息署在2018年12月的一份报告中表示，预计今年年底美国的液化天然气出口量将翻倍，达到每天89亿立方英尺，使美国成为液化天然气第三大出口国，仅次于卡塔尔和澳大利亚。到2030年，美国液化天然气出口预计达到每天170亿立方英尺，而2019年年初出口量为每天30亿立方英尺。
In Canada, there is just one LNG project under development right now - LNG Canada - but it could have a final capacity of 28 million tons of the fuel annually. The US$31-billion project is led by Shell, with minority participants including Petronas, PetroChina, Mitsubishi, and Kogas.	加拿大目前只有一个正在开发的液化天然气项目，即加拿大液化天然气项目，但该项目最终年产量可能达到2800万吨。这项斥资310亿美元的项目是由壳牌牵头的，次要投资方有马来西亚石油、中国石油、三菱和韩国天然气公司。
Meanwhile, Qatar is stepping up its efforts to keep its number-one spot in the global LNG export race. The country has lifted a moratorium on new drilling in its North Field - the world's largest offshore gas field Qatar shares with Iran - aiming to boost export capacity by 43 percent to 11 million tons annually.	与此同时，卡塔尔正在加紧步伐，以保持其全球液化天然气出口第一的位置。卡塔尔曾禁止在与伊朗共有的全球最大海上天然气田北油田进行新钻探，现已取消禁令，旨在将年出口提高43%至1100万吨。
Global LNG demand is seen at 550 million tons by 2030, according to projections by IHS Markit.	根据IHS Markit预测，到2030年，全球液化天然气需求预计达到5.5亿吨。
Viola Davis Drops Some Truth Bombs About Playing Michelle Obama On 'Jimmy Kimmel'	维奥拉·戴维斯在吉米·金梅尔节目中讲出扮演米歇尔·奥巴马的真相
Viola Davis is feeling the pressure of playing Michelle Obama.	维奥拉·戴维斯正在感受扮演米歇尔·奥巴马的压力。
"I'm terrified," the actor said on "Jimmy Kimmel Live" Thursday.	“我很害怕。”这位演员周四在“吉米·金梅尔直播”节目中说。
It was announced last month that Davis would star as the former first lady in Showtime's dramatized "First Ladies" anthology series. Davis said the script is great, but she's keenly aware of the burden to get her performance right.	上个月宣布，戴维斯将在Showtime电视网改编的深夜档选集剧“第一夫人”系列中扮演前第一夫人。戴维斯说剧本很出色，但她强烈感到要表演得当的压力。
"I don't care what else I've done in my life ― I won an Emmy, I won an Oscar, two Tonys ― but if I mess this up, this'll be the defining moment in my life," she told host Kimmel.	她对主持人吉米说：“我不管我的人生已经有了什么成就——我拿过艾美奖，奥斯卡奖，两届托尼奖——但如果我把这次搞砸了，这就是我人生的决定性时刻。”
Davis said she's waiting for her publicist "to call and say, "Hold the line, it's Michelle Obama ― to cuss your ass out.""	戴维斯说，她正在等待她的经纪人打来电话说，“等一下，不要挂，是米歇尔·奥巴马打来的——要把你骂得屁滚尿流。”
Davis, in her sixth and final season of "How To Get Away With Murder," is also thinking of the audience.	戴维斯在“逍遥法外”的第六季和最终季中，同样在考虑观众。
"Listen, I don't want to make my people mad," she said.	“我不想让我的人生气。”她说。
Judge shows concern for violent teen's choice of drink on attack night	法官对暴力少年在袭击当晚选择的酒类表示关注
A judge sentencing a teenager for a violent attack on a love rival appeared to show just as much concern about his choice of drink in the lead up to it.	一位法官在判处一名暴力攻击情敌的少年时，似乎对他在袭击之前的酒水选择也同样关注。
Kieran Clifton, 19, battered a 17-year-old he blamed for the end of his relationship with a former girlfriend.	19岁的基兰·克利夫顿殴打了一名17岁的男生，指责他导致他和前女友感情的结束。
Oxford Crown Court heard Clifton had been drinking mixers at the Fat Fox pub in Watlington, Oxfordshire, shortly before the assault in March last year.	牛津皇家法院获悉，去年三月袭击事件发生前不久，克利夫顿在牛津郡沃特灵顿的Fat Fox酒吧喝过调制酒。
Judge Nigel Daly told Clifton, who admitted ABH, that the alcohol had "played a significant part" in the night's violence.	法官奈吉尔·戴利告诉已承认触犯实际身体伤害罪的克利夫顿，酒精在当晚的暴力中“起到了重要作用”。
But he remarked of Clifton's choice of tipple: "Drinking Coca Cola and Amaretto? I'm surprised you were not sick!"	可是，对于克利夫顿所选择的酒类，他说：“可口可乐和苦杏仁酒一起喝？你竟然没病！”
Clifton, from Chalgrove, was handed a 12-month sentence, suspended for 12 months, ordered to complete a 15-day rehabilitation activity requirement along with 160 hours" unpaid work and pay £750 compensation.	来自查尔格罗夫的克利夫顿被判处12个月的刑期，缓刑12个月。他也必须完成一个15天的康复活动及160个小时的无偿工作，并支付750英镑的赔偿。
'It sounds dorky, but it's really fun': inside the cosy world of bookstagram	“很呆也很有趣”：bookstagram舒适的内部世界
A pink blanket goes with everything: Jane Austen classics, a queer young-adult romcom, fantasy novel Six of Crows. Jordan Hickey's version is crocheted, made by her grandmother, and appears in most photos on her Instagram account pagetravels, where it's paired with various books to evoke a sense of tantalizing coziness. Wouldn't you like to be here right now, her photos imply, cuddled up with this blanket and this mug of coffee, with nothing else on your to-do list aside from reading the new novel Frankly In Love, out today?	用一条粉色的毯子搭配一切：简·奥斯汀的经典作品，同性恋青年浪漫喜剧，奇幻小说“六只乌鸦”。乔丹·希基的毯子是祖母亲手编织的，在她的Instagram帐号“书页之旅”的大部分照片中都有出现，与各种书籍相互搭配，唤起一种亲切的感觉。她的照片仿佛在暗示，你不想现在就身处此地吗？依偎在毯子里，拿着这杯咖啡，同时待办事项清单里什么都没有，除了读这本今天新出的小说“坦诚的爱”？
Hickey is a part of "bookstagram," the corner of Instagram combining a love of books with stylized, eye-catching photos, to the delight of large fanbases. The bookstagram tag has been used on over 35m Instagram posts, and the more popular bookstrammers have upwards of 100,000 followers (for comparison, the Instagram for the New York Times book section has about 69,000 followers.) There are enough people joining bookstagram that a slew of articles have cropped up, advising would-be bookstagrammers on best practice, how to manage Instagram's "pesky algorithm" and the best budget-friendly props. Some accounts focus on old books, or books by authors of color, many play with elaborate staging.	希基是“bookstagram”的一员，这是Instagram的一角，将对书籍的热爱与风格化而吸引眼球的照片结合在一起，让庞大的粉丝群体欣喜不已。在Instagram上，已经有超过3500万的帖子使用了“bookstagram”标签，一些网红书友的粉丝数高达10万人（与之相比，《纽约时报》图书板块的Instagram有约6.9万粉丝）。加入“bookstagram”的人多到一连串的文章涌现了出来，为想要成为网红书友的人提供最佳实践建议，如何管理Instagram“麻烦的算法”，以及价格友好的道具。有的帐号主题是旧书，有的是有色人种作家的书，而很多帐号都会精心进行摆放。
Leader of Colombia's Los Pelusos crime gang killed, president says	哥伦比亚比亚总统表示洛斯佩卢索斯犯罪集团头目已被处决
The top leader and founder of Colombia's Los Pelusos crime gang has been killed in an operation led by the national police, President Ivan Duque said on Friday.	哥伦比亚洛斯佩卢索斯（Los Pelusos）犯罪集团创立者和首号头目于国家警察实施的一行动中被处决，总统伊万·杜克（Ivan Duque）于星期五表示。
The gang is one of the most well-known criminal organizations in the Andean country and involved in fighting that has endangered hundreds of thousands of people in areas along the eastern border with Venezuela.	此集团是该安第斯国家中最臭名昭著的犯罪组织，其所制造事端危及该国与委内瑞拉接壤东部地区数十万人的安全。
Luis Antonio Quintero, known by his alias Pacora, was a former leftist rebel who commanded some 440 gang members, the government said.	路易斯·安东尼奥·金特罗（Luis Antonio Quintero），外号帕科拉（Pacora），属前左翼叛军，领导一大约有440名成员的犯罪集团，政府表示。
The 49-year-old was wanted on terrorism and murder charges and located in Norte de Santander province on Thursday.	这名49岁的黑帮老大因恐怖主义和谋杀指控而被通缉。星期四其被发现位于北桑坦德省。
"It's clear we are going to completely break up this group," Duque said in a statement from the United States, where he traveled for the United Nations General Assembly this week.	“很明显，我们要彻底剿灭这个集团，”杜克到达美国后在一讲话中表示，其将于本周参加联合国大会。
Quintero was responsible for the killings of human rights activists and community leaders, the statement added.	金特罗应为杀害人权激进人士或社会领导人者负责，他补充道。
Duque has faced criticism from some in the international community for not doing more to stop killings of activists from being committed with impunity across the country.	杜克由于没能竭力阻止国内激进人士遭肆意谋杀而受到国际社会中某些人批评。
Another leader of Los Pelusos was captured in the operation, the statement added. It did not provide details about the circumstances of Quintero's death.	该集团另一头目在行动中被抓捕，他补充道,但并没有透露金特罗死亡状况的细节。
'How dare you?' Thunberg's U.N. speech inspires Dutch climate protesters	“你们好大的胆子！”桑伯格联合国演讲让荷兰气候变化抗议者备感振奋
Thousands of Dutch children skipped school to join a global climate strike on Friday, blocking traffic and asking their leaders "how dare you?" in a reference to Swedish teenage activist Greta Thunberg's speech at the United Nations.	成千上万的荷兰孩子为参加全球气候变化游行纷纷罢课，交通因此陷入瘫痪。他们质问政府领导人“你们好大的胆子！”——出自瑞典激进主义少女格雷塔·桑伯格（Greta Thunberg）的联合国演讲。
A participant holds a drawing depicting Swedish environmental activist Greta Thunberg during a protest march to call for action against climate change, in The Hague, Netherlands September 27, 2019. REUTERS/Piroschka van de Wouw	一游行者举着一幅图画，上面描绘着瑞典激进环保主义者格雷塔·桑伯格2019年9月27日于荷兰海牙一游行示威中呼吁对气候变化采取行动。路透社/比罗施卡·范德沃乌（Piroschka van de Wouw）
Turnout at the march in The Hague exceeded expectations with organizers estimating the crowd at about 35,000. Police were forced to reroute the march to a location with more space.	海牙游行示威的人数超过预期，组织者预计总人数达三万五千人左右。警方不得不让游行队伍转移到另一更为宽阔的位置。
Thunberg, 16, gave an impassioned address at the United Nations in New York this week, after millions of people worldwide joined a climate strike protest last Friday in the run-up to a U.N. climate summit.	上周五，联合国气候峰会前夕，全世界数百万人纷纷加入气候变化罢工游行，而16岁的桑伯格于本周在联合国纽约总部发表饱含激情的演讲。
"This strike is going to have a lot of effect when people keep showing up, not just today but also in the future and we see different kinds of people from all walks of life," said protester Reinder Rustema.	“人们的不断加入将让此次游行影响深远，不仅在今天，而且在未来，我们看到了各行各业不同的人，”抗议者勒德·鲁斯塔马（Reinder Rustema）说道。
Banging drums and holding pictures of Thunberg, protesters walked through the city center with placards reading: "For the Greta good," "Don't be a fossil fool," and "You will die of old age, we will die of climate change."	边击鼓边举着桑伯格的照片，抗议者穿过市中心，并打着“格雷塔万岁”、“不当化石能源的傀儡”、“你会死于衰老，我们将死于气候变化”等标语。
"I understand their concerns, I believe they are being heard," Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte told journalists at a weekly press briefing within earshot of the protests. "We have presented very ambitious plans to deal with these problems. But we have to do it in a smart way, which also creates jobs."	“我理解他们的忧虑，也相信他们将被世人所知，”荷兰首相马克·吕特（Mark Rutte）在一每周例行新闻发布会中告诉记者，会场中仍能听见抗议游行之声。“我们已提出宏大的计划处理这些问题。但我们得以明智的方式实行计划，以使其还可创造工作岗位。”
Thunberg's brief address electrified the start of the summit aimed at mobilizing government and business to break international paralysis over carbon emissions, which hit record highs last year despite decades of warnings from scientists.	桑伯格的简短演讲一层激起千里浪，让峰会开始对准政府和企业的动员以打破碳排放国际僵局。据悉，尽管科学家过去数十年内一再警告，去年全球碳排放还是创下历史新高。
"This is all wrong. I shouldn't be up here. I should be back in school on the other side of the ocean yet you all come to us young people for hope. How dare you?" she said, her voice quavering with emotion.	“这大错特错。我不应该站在这里。我应该回到大洋另一边的学校，但你们全都涌向我们年轻人寻找希望。你们好大的胆子！” 她说道，声音因饱含情感而颤抖。
The Netherlands, with 17 million inhabitants, generated less than 7 percent of all energy from sustainable sources in 2017, compared to 15 percent in Germany and over half of all energy in Sweden.	荷兰拥有1700万人口，2017年可持续能源产生的能量占总能量不到7%，而德国该数字是15%，瑞典则超过一半。
The government has pledged to halve CO2 emissions from 1990 levels by 2030, but by 2017 had only achieved a 13 percent cut.	政府已保证到2030年让CO2排放量减少到1990年水平的一半，但到2017年，减排目标只完成13%。
Thunberg was taking part in a protest in Canada on Friday where U.N. aviation leaders were gathering in Montreal to discuss plane emissions targets.	星期五，桑伯格正于加拿大参加游行示威，而联合国航空领导人也正聚于蒙特利尔探讨航空碳排放目标。
Military Sees Frustrating Trend As Suicides Spike	军队自杀人数激增，情势不容乐观
Military suicides surged this year to a record high among active duty troops, continuing a deadly trend that Pentagon officials say is frustrating and they are struggling to counter.	今年现役军人自杀人数激增，创下了最高纪录，使这一致命趋势继续延续。五角大楼官员表示情势不容乐观，而他们正在努力对抗。
The Army, Navy and Marine Corps all saw the rate of suicides go up as well as the overall numbers, with only the Air Force showing a decrease, according to data released by the Pentagon Thursday. Suicides among members of the Reserves and the National Guard also grew.	五角大楼周四发布的数据显示，陆军、海军和海军陆战队的自杀率和总人数均有上升，只有空军有所下降。预备军和国民警卫队中的自杀者也越来越多。
The difficulties involved in identifying service members with possible problems and finding ways to prevent suicides were underscored earlier this month when the Navy reported that three crew members who served on the USS George H.W. Bush took their own lives within a week.	本月早些时候，海军报告了三起在美国“布什”号上服役船员的自杀事件，这再次强调了识别可能有问题的服役人员和寻找防止自杀的方法所涉及的困难。船员在一周内相继自杀。
Asked about the deaths in the crew of the aircraft carrier, Defense Secretary Mark Esper said, "I wish I could tell you we have an answer to prevent further, future suicides in the Armed Services. We don't. We are caught up in what some call a national epidemic of suicide among our youth."	当被问及艘航母船员死亡的事件时，美国国防部长马克·埃斯珀说：“我很希望我能告诉你，我们已有了一个答案，能防止军队以后发生更多的自杀事件。但我们没有。我们陷入了所谓的全国性年轻人自杀潮。”
The number of suicides across the military increased from 511 in 2017 to 541 in 2018. According to the Pentagon, the most at-risk population is young enlisted men, and at least 60 percent of the time they chose a gun as their suicide method. Army suicides went from 114 to 139, while the Marines went from 43 to 58 and the Navy went from 65 to 68. The Air Force dipped from 63 to 60.	军队自杀人数从2017年的511人增加到2018年的541人。五角大楼表示，自杀风险最高的人群是应征入伍的青年男性，而在至少60%的时间里，他们选择枪支作为自杀方式。陆军自杀人数从114人增加到139人，海军陆战队从43人增加到58人，而海军从65人增加到68人。空军从63人下降到60人。
"Our numbers are not moving in the right direction," said Elizabeth Van Winkle, director of the Pentagon's office of force resiliency. She said that most of the military rates are comparable to civilians, but added, "that's hardly comforting."	“我们的数字并没有向正确的方向发展。”五角大楼部队适应能力办公室的主管伊丽莎白·凡·温克尔说。她说，大多数军队的自杀率接近平民，但是又补充说，“这很难让人感到安慰。”
Military and defense leaders expressed dismay and a resolve to do more to increase resilience in the force, train service members how to handle stress better and encourage troops to seek help when they need it. Van Winkle said the military is also looking at increasing efforts to train troops on the safe storage of firearms and medication. She said there are no consistent rules or regulations across the department and the services requiring gun locks or other controls on firearms, but that some states or bases have their own restrictions.	军方和国防部领导人表示失望，并下决心做更多的工作，以提高部队的适应能力，培训服役人员如何更好地处理压力，并鼓励部队在需要时寻求帮助。温克尔说，军方也在考虑加大对部队安全储存武器和药品方面的培训力度。她说，整个部门和各军种并没有一致的规定或者纪律，要求对枪支上锁，或者其他对武器的管控措施，但某些州或者基地有自己的限制。
She and Karen Orvis, director of the suicide prevention office, said recognizing service members who may be struggling or at risk of taking their own lives is very difficult, and that sometimes suicide is a sudden, impulsive decision with little warning. They said it's difficult to identify reasons for suicide because there are so many stresses that could contribute.	她和自杀干预办公室的主管凯伦·奥维斯说，要认出可能正在挣扎或有自杀风险的服役人员是非常困难的，有时候自杀是突发的冲动决定，几乎没有预警。他们说，很难确定自杀的原因，因为有太多压力可能导致自杀。
They also acknowledged that service members are reluctant to come forward and seek help, because they worry that it could affect promotions or security clearances. And military leaders said they must all work harder to address those perceived roadblocks.	他们还承认，服役人员很抵触站出来寻求帮助，因为他们担心会影响晋升或者安全审查。而军方领导人说，他们都必须更加努力解决这些已知的障碍。
"Just as we talk about physical fitness, marksmanship, training and education, Marines must also be comfortable discussing life's struggles, mental wellness and suicide," said Gen. David Berger, commandant of the Marine Corps. "We must create a community where seeking help and assistance are simply normal, important decisions Marines and sailors make."	“就像我们讨论身体健康、枪法、训练和教育一样，海军陆战队也必须能从容地讨论生活中的挣扎、心理健康和自杀行为。”海军陆战队指挥官金·大卫·伯格说。“我们必须营造一种群体环境，让寻求帮助和援手仅仅是海军陆战队员和水手做出的正常而重要的决定。”
This year for the first time, the Pentagon included statistics for suicides by military spouses and dependents. Van Winkle said the most recent numbers available were for 2017, but officials are working to get better at collecting family data.	今年是五角大楼首次将军人的配偶和受抚养人的自杀数字纳入统计范围。温克尔说，最新的数据是2017年的，但官员正在努力更好地收集家庭数据。
According to the report, there were 186 families that had suicides - 123 were spouses and 63 were dependents between the ages of 12 and 23.	根据这份报告，186个家庭出现了自杀事件——123人是配偶，63人是受抚养人，年龄在12到23岁之间。
The vast majority - nearly 70 percent - were female spouses under the age of 40, while 70 percent of the dependent suicides were males. About half of the dependents who died by suicide were at least 18 years old and, for those younger than that, most of the deaths were youth between 15 and 17.	大多数（接近70%）的自杀者是年龄40岁以下的妻子，而70%自杀的受抚养人是男性。在自杀的受抚养人中，大约一半的人已满18岁，而在低于这个年龄的人中，死亡者大多数是15到17岁之间的青少年。

Geomagnetic Storm in the Last days of September	地磁风暴九月末来袭
Geomagnetic disturbances are expected from September 27 to September 29, according to the US National Atmospheric and Oceanic Research Agency's Space Weather Forecast Center. Moderate geomagnetic storm (G2) is possible due to high-speed solar wind	美国国家海洋和大气管理局太空天气预报中心预计，9月27至29日将有地磁扰动。高速太阳风，或将带来中度地磁风暴（G2）。
The Russian Laboratory for Solar Activity Research at the Lebedev Institute predicts that the disturbance will start in the evening of September 27, and culminate in the next day from morning until noon. The planetary index can jump to 5 Kp level.	列别杰夫研究所太阳活动研究俄国实验室预计，此次扰动将从9月27日开始，在第二天中午达到顶峰。行星指数可达5Kp。
Geomagnetic storms can affect people with problems in the cardiovascular system. Doctors warn that some people may develop heart cramps, dizziness, headache and lack of concentration. Magnetic disturbances often affect people with mental disorders as well.	地磁风暴可能对心血管系统产生影响。医生警告，一些人可能出现心脏痉挛、晕眩、头痛、注意力涣散等症状。地磁扰动也常造成人的精神状态失常。
In case of more severe disturbances, there are also fluctuations in the electricity grid. Satellites providing navigation information are also vulnerable.	若扰动严重，也可能产生电网波动。提供导航信息的卫星也会变弱。
The beautiful side of such phenomena are the spectacular Northern Lights in the sky above the poles.	该现象美好的一面，是极地上空壮观的北极光。
Sony, Disney Back To Work On Third Spider-Man Film	索尼与迪士尼重回第三部蜘蛛侠电影的制作
Looks like there will be a homecoming of sorts for Spider-Man, now that Disney and Sony have settled their differences.	现在迪士尼和索尼已经解决了他们的分歧，看来蜘蛛侠能以某种形式回归了。
The two studios announced on Friday that they will collaborate on a third Spider-Man film starring Tom Holland.	周五，两家工作室宣布将合作拍摄第三部由汤姆·霍兰德主演的蜘蛛侠电影。
The as yet untitled film will be released on July 16, 2021, and be produced by the Disney-owned Marvel Studios and its president, Kevin Feige, according to a press release sent by both studios.	根据两家工作室发来的新闻稿，这部尚未决定标题的电影将于2021年7月16日上映，由迪士尼旗下的漫威工作室及其总裁凯文·法伊格担任制片方。
Amy Pascal will also produce through Pascal Pictures, as she has on the first two Holland-led films, the release said.	新闻稿表示，艾米·帕斯卡尔也将通过帕斯卡尔影业担任制片人，如同她在前两部霍兰德主演的电影中一样。

"Spider-Man is a powerful icon and hero whose story crosses all ages and audiences around the globe."	法伊格在新闻稿中说：“我很激动，小蜘蛛在MCU的旅程将会继续。我和漫威工作室的所有人都很兴奋能够继续制作。”“蜘蛛侠是一位强大的偶像和英雄，他的故事跨越了全球所有年龄段的观众。”
The agreement also allows Spidey to appear in a future Marvel Studios film.	他们的协议还允许小蜘蛛在未来的漫威工作室电影中出现。
Feige acknowledged the collaboration makes the webslinger unique among superheroes.	法伊格表示，正是这次合作让蜘蛛侠在众多超级英雄中独树一帜。

The end to the Spidey standoff came more than a month after it was reported the two studios were unable to reach terms on a deal for a sequel to their previous films, "Homecoming" and "Far From Home."	据说两家工作室无法就之前的两部电影《蜘蛛侠：返校》和《蜘蛛侠：英雄远征》的续作达成一致，一个多月之后，关于小蜘蛛的僵局才结束。
The sticking point was that Disney ― which owns the character ― reportedly wanted a co-financing stake in future films with Sony, which has the film rights thanks to deals set up before the Mouse bought Marvel in 2009.	分歧点在于，角色的拥有者迪士尼据说想在未来的电影中与索尼共同拥有融资股份，而在迪士尼于2009年收购漫威前，索尼就因为之前的协议拥有了电影权。
The Hollywood Reporter notes both sides had good reason to come together. "Far From Home" is Sony's biggest box office hit ever, while Marvel gets to maximize merchandising and keep creative control.	好莱坞记者指出，双方有充足的理由携手合作。《英雄远征》是索尼有史以来的最大票房冠军，同时漫威能够最大限度地展销并保持对创意的控制。
